i23b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ de la rna bar thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs nas gyis gzugs rnas
i23b5('bum): mthong ba 'di ni rno bar thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rold kyi gzugs rnaMs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha dad pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos par 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gsu pa'o// 
i23b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ pra'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar de bzhin ga
i23b7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gnas la yang gnas la yang dag pa ci la bzhin dur rab tu sheso// gang
i23b8('bum): ma yin pa la yang gnas su yin par yang dag pa ji ltar te zhen du rab tu shes// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang de ltar byung ba'i las yongasu len pa rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rna bar dang / rgyu'i rna ba yang dag pa jil
i24a1('bum): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nus par gyur cing sna chags kyi 'du shes yad l-I myi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam tha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rna pa thams cad du
i24a2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rna shes mtha' yaso zhes te/ rna shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rdo rjeHthams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
i24a3('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs tigan so// de rnga pa thas cad du cung zad myed pa'i sku mched la nye bar dag par 'das te// 'du shes myed 'bru zla'i myed min skye
i24a4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrebs te gzugs so// de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin ske mchen las nye bar yang dag par 'dres te/ 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar
i24a5('bum): sgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do// de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i24a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge' chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can pas rten dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ 
i24a7('bum): de rnam par rig pa dang rnam par dpyod page bar gonas dang mo su dang ste/ sos kyi gyur gcig tu gyu radapas rtog pa skyed par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde brgyan gyis nan gnyis ma
i24a8('bum): nye bar sgrubs te gnas te/ de dga' las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bting snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phag pa rnaMs kyis de lo dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rna par spyodas
i24b1('bum): gtong snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myong ba'i bras rten gsum po lngan por skyobs ta ko nas sa/ bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing de yang myo bde bas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myeng sdug
i24b2('bum): sngal ba yang myed/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bas rten bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te ga naso// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes lnga yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnaMs nub
i24b3('bum): gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dri la myi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// de rna pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
i24b4('bum): par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te rna shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad myeng mi yod
i24b5('bum): zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rjes pa thos cad cung zad myeng po'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrub te gnaso// de rjes pa thas cad du 'du shes
i24b6('bum): myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag pa 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog par du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar sgrubs te gan/ de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i spros pa 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses
i24b7('bum): dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gan la yang
i24b8('bum): yang dag pa ci lnga bzhin du rab tu sheso// gan pa yin pa la yang gnas yin par yang dag ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sh+lo/ 'das pa dang byon pa dang da ltar 'byung ba'i las dang las yong sku len pa rna pa smin pa gan kyi ni dang / hUM'i rna pab yang dag pa'i lta
i25a1('bum): tshunamo nyi chos sochags ca du/ 'ag nyen gyi khams dus las bya bar yang drug pa dzum pa bzhin du nga tug sa/ sems can gzha dgra ma zag gnan ngas sa
i25a2('bum): kyi'i dzu ma rjes na 'a shes so// sa can gzhing ga nga shing thas shes dag gi dbang tho rab dang ma nyis par bya ba mang ngas pa ji lta pa bzhin du ra / kuni
i25a3('bum): ma shing rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du tsun s+ho/ dbang po dang skabs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / khas gtan dang / rnam par tharang pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
i25a4('bum): byang ba rna par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te tsher rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs brgya stong pa dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang cher sa
i25a5('bum): bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rje su dra no// skal pa cig kyang rje su dran nas skal pa rgya dang // skal pa stong dang skal pa rgya phrag sto
i25a6('bum): dong / skal pa bye ba khwak+ta khrig brgya slong gi ba dag kyang rjesu dran to/ nga ga ni 'di lta bu nag na 'dug 'jug/ myong ni 'od zhes bya'o// rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o// sa na 'di zhes bya'o// zas na 'ong bza'o// su 'i sring
i25a7('bum): su gnas gnas/ tsho mtha' ni 'dadi tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas 'bas nas myi ge ma jig tu smos zhes bya ba nas de nas shi 'phos nas 'di skye sa nas bya byor rnam pa bya sa sum la mas
i25a8('bum): tshigs dang bcas pa rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no// lha'i migra rnaM ma dag ma lugs 'das sa sems can shi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / kha dog sug pa dang / kha ros kyi sug
i25b1('bum): ring bde 'gron 'khod pa dang/ pheM song na 'jug pa dang / las dza lta ba banon dun par 'gro ba'i rnams nin rnamada' tsu non// sems can 'ad ga na lus kyin du myong pa dang ldan pa
i25b2('bum): dag gas par spyong pa dang na pa/ yid kyis na tu srung ba dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa ldog par lta ba dag ste/ de'i myude byin kyis lus ni gnas do song lag par srung ba seMs can la
i25b3('bum): seMs can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ldan pa 'phags pa la skur ba myi 'debs pa dang yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de rje
i25b4('bum): rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mthong ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// zhes bya bar rab tu shes// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir seMs rna bar grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba zad pa myed pa// rang gis mngon par shes pas
i25b5('bum): mngon par tu byas te/ nye bar sgrubs shing rnam par spyod do// bdag gi skye ba ni zad do bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyod/ bya ba ni byas so rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni myongo zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de yang myi dmigs
i25b6('bum): pa rgyas kyi sa byang chub se ma pa' sems dpa' chen pa 'jig pa chen par/ rab 'byor nga gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi jigs pa pani smi/ pa'i gang den/ bangag ga dun
i25b7('bum): gas pangs sa rgyasas// zhes bya bar dam na// de cas yinamapa na sam mnyis bya bar bangag nga sa po sa yang/ bdud nga ma sman du
i25b8('bum): chen na chos dang ldan par nos pa gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyuyang dag par rjes myi mthong / rgyu yang dag par rjesu myi mthong gis de la bdag bde bathob pa dang / bag ma ba me
i26a1('bum): thab pas rnam par spyod do// khyu mchog rlabs pa'i gnas su dam bcas 'aM// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra ste/ ga go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge' skyed dum/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud ngam tshangs pa
i26a2('bum): gzhan du yang rung ste chos dang ldan pa'i bskor mi nus pa dag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag gis zag pa zang rdo nas rdzi dam bcas so// / me rjid zag pa 'di rnams yong su zad par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la ga
i26a3('bum): spong ngam/ bram ze 'i lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na ches dang ldan par bskor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su mya mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjesu ma mthong bas de la bdag
i26a4('bum): bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba myed pa thab pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas/ dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ tshatshungs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dga' spyong ngam
i26a5('bum): bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstand pa de dag la bstan du nus par
i26a6('bum): chad kyi tshe su ma gyu rang pa/ de lta bu'i gnas myed do// de'i phyir bdag la dge slong ngam// bram ze 'am lto 'am/ bla dang dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya
i26a7('bum): ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjesu ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam
i26a8('bum): btsa'/ 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs/ tshangs pa'i'i'akhor lo 'jig rten na dge slong du/ bram ze 'am lnga'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ tshes dang ldan par skor bar mi nus par
i26b1('bum): gos rab tu skor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba / bstan pa de dgu la nan tan byas na/ sdug sngal yang dag par thad par
i26b2('bum): 'thung ngo zhes bya bar de lta bu'i gnas myed pa'i phyir/ mang ga la dge' sbyong ngas/ bran ze 'am lha 'am / nibadud dem tshungs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu mang
i26b3('bum): dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su myi mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thog pa dang bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang myi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam baspyad // khyu mchod rlabs po che'i gan su da bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng geSh+Ti
i26b4('bum): sgra sgrogs go tshangs pa'i khor// gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
i26b5('bum): pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems cad dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ don sos yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag
i26b6('bum): rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ rab 'byor de 'di yang / de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'o// rab 'byor/ 
i26b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres lnga bcwa brgyad de/ bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ gang ga ni ma la de bzhin gshegs bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i26b8('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nam la lta dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dgo' sgong dang bram zer bcas pa'i sku dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lce ma yin du bcas pa'i sreg
i27a1('bum): bsngal zad par 'gyu rang ba'i la gyis rjes su bstan te/ phung de ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangasu ma ngon gyis 'da' bar 'gyuraro// da' bar du de 'i rnon gshig so pa 'i 'khrul pa myi mngoro// tsa rtse myi mnga' dgongs
i27a2('bum): pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs nyam par ma gzhag pa myi mdo'o// ma?Hbrtags pa'i btad snyoms ma mnga'o// mo smai pa yongasu nyes pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs nyes pa myi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs
i27a3('bum): nyams pa myi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzi nad yongasasu nyes pa myi mthang 'o// shes rab yongs su nyes pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzugs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// sku'i
i27a4('bum): 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phran las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phran las thas cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba snga
i27a5('bum): ye shes kyi rjesu 'bra // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
i27a6('bum): pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor de 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
i27a7('bum): pa chen po ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ yi ge mnyam nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang tha yi ge la 'dzag pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni'i ma skyes pa'i phyir
i27a8('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'i/ ba zhes bya ba ni d+hen rnam pa bstan pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni shi 'pho dang skye ma myi dmigs pa'i phyir
i27b1('bum): chos thams cad kyi ske'o/ na zhes bya ba na myang dang bral zhing mngag rang bzhin ma thub ma ster blos ches thams cad kyi sgo'o/ la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i khri shing dang rgyu
i27b2('bum): rang rkyen yang dag par bcos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nga zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang nges pa'i glan su yongasu nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// kha zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
i27b3('bum): Da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa myi dmigs pas par mi 'gyur 'ching bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag/ 
i27b4('bum): par chad pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las mo g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// swa zhes bya ba ni
i27b5('bum): khengs pa myi dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ches thams cad kyi ste'o// ka zhes bya ba ni byung pa ni po myi myigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid myi dmyigs pas mnya pa nyid mas myi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams
i27b6('bum): cad kyi sgo'o/ ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bye ba mi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi Sh+yo/ ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba myi myigs pa'i phyir ches thas cad kyi sgo'o// thaM zhes bya ba ni gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo
i27b7('bum): dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sha zhes bya ba ni dbug su myi dmyigs myed pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// de zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyingasu dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ches zas cad kyi sgo'o// sha zhes bya ba ni
i27b8('bum): ni gnas dmyigs su mod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid dmyig su skyed pa'i phyir chos cad kyi sgo'o/ kwa zhes bya ba ni zad pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sku'o// sa zhes bya ban
i28a1('bum): bstod pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bA zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmyig su myed pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// rtswa zhes bya ba ni nyin mongs pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ha nas
i28a2('bum): bya ba ni rgyu myi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bA zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ske'o// cha zhes bya ba ni mi dog myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// swa zhes bya ba ning
i28a3('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ha zhes bya na bod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ske'o// tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gA zhes bya ba ni stug po myi dmyigs
i28a4('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tha zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ni zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa gang la yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba myed de/ gnas pa myed pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba myed
i28a5('bum): rnam par myi rig pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sde'o// pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// skra zhes bya ba ni phung po dmyigasu myeng ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// yas zhes bya ba ni myi dbyugs
i28a6('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thas cad kyi sgo'o// Da zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa myi dmyigs pa'is mtha'
i28a7('bum): thug par gnas par shi 'pho ba myed cing skye ba myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang gang gis brjod par dang / gang gis bstan
i28a8('bum): pa dang / gang bri ba dang / gang bstand pa dang gang glag par bya ba ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang yang gang gis tha snyad de lta bu'i mying yadi myed spong rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dpe' nam mkha'
i28b1('bum): ni durgyas byas pa dud sa byas// ngam byed 'di ni gsung / zhes drug pa sa las grags sa kyin ma 'dug pa// ram 'gyur byang chu bya sems dpa ses da 'dran togang gas sa
i28b2('bum): pa'i yi go la mkhas par bya ba 'od yongasu shes na de ni sgra gang la yang chags par myi 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag sgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byorarang byang chub seM swA hA
i28b3('bum): gang gis a la stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang / a la stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzind pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing gzham
i28b4('bum): yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos stond na de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'i nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan blo gros dang ldan/ rtogs pa dang ldan blo dang ldan pa dga' ba dang ldan ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ sto
i28b5('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i gyu rang pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa myed par tho com myed par 'gyur ro// gzhan khros dgra snyan pa thos kyang chags par gyu rang ba myed pa cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar myo gyur
i28b6('bum): bas mtho ba myed ning dma' ba myed de tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par gyu rang ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur pa dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 
i28b7('bum): rten cing 'brel pan 'byung ba la mkhas te/ rgyu la mkhas shing rkye nang la mkhas par 'gyu rang ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par gyu rang ba dang / dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang // shi 'pho dang skye
i28b8('bum): shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyurang ba dang / lta ba'i rnab shes par bya ba la mkhas par ma gyurang ba dang / pha rol gyi ses shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sngon gi gnas rje su dran pa shes pa bya ba la mkhas
i29a1('bum): par 'gyur pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes par bya ba la mkhas par ma gyu rang ba dang zag pa zabs rtosmos par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas ma yin pa stan pa shes par bya bya la mkhas par 'gyu rang
i29a2('bum): ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / spyod la la mkhas par 'gyu rang ba dang sti khrel yod par 'gyur bya dang / ngo tsha shes pa lta mkhas pa 'ang thob pa 'gyu ra to// rab 'byor da gzungs kyi sgo a las stsogs
i29a3('bum): pa'i yi ge la 'dzag pa 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// 9sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ le'u bcu pa'o// 
i29a4('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// rab 'byorang gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na/ byang chub sem/ swa pA sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zer ba ni/ rab 'byor du 'di la byang chub ses
i29a5('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar te/ rab 'byor de ji ltar na// byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas 'phar ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgas
i29a6('bum): thams cad 'pho ba myed pas chos gang yang 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba myed 'pho ba myed nye bar 'pho ba myedado/ 'on kye/ nga chos thas cad kyis kyang gang yin pa de la rlom ses su byed pa'i sems dpa' myed do// sa yong su spyod ba yang mya 'dre
i29a7('bum): ma yin la sa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor ngas dang po la gnas pa'i ses dpa' ses dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyang ba
i29a8('bum): po 'di dag bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la stsogs pas yongasasu/ skyong ba dang / mtshan ma myi dmyigs pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongasu sbyang zhing / ses can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ses
i29b1('bum): can thams cad la seMs nyim nyid yongasu sbyang ba dang // sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang len pa myi dmyigs par phyir gtod ba yongasu sbyong ba dang / des rlom sems su myi bya ba'i phyir du dge ba'i gshes gnyen bsten pa yangs
i29b2('bum): sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim myi dmyigs pa'i phyir yang dang ying du 'byung ba yongasasu sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dbye'i bya bzang po myi dmyigs pas sangs rgyas kyi sku
i29b3('bum): la mos pa yongasasu spyang ba dang / chos kyi rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos rnam par dbye' ba yongasasu spyad ba dang // chos kyi yang dag pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i phyir nga rgyal dang khyengs pa terje gsal ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / tshig myi dmyigs
i29b4('bum): pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor nga yongasu sbyang ba yongasu ban+d+ha pa de dag ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag go// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' se
i29b5('bum): dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang // du yid la bya ste// de la// nan du bya'o// brgyad gang zhe na yang 'di lta ste tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / bya ba shes shing drin du bzo ba dang / brjod
i29b6('bum): pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu myi rjod pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dong pas gus par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin/ 
i29b7('bum): pa rnams la brtson zhing rtsol ba ste/ rab 'byor nga chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub ses dpa' se so dpa' po sde gnyis pa la gnas pas yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya ba dgo// rab 'byor dgan
i29b8('bum): yang byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po sa gsum la gnas pas chos lnga la/ gnas par bya ste 9/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste mang du thos pas myi ngoms shing de la yang yi ge la mngon par mazhen pa dang / zang zing myed par chos kyi
i30a1('bum): sbyin pa rnam par byed ci des kyang rnas sems su myi 'gyur ba sangs rgyas kyi nang mi su dge par bya 'i das pa rgyab sgra sri mengasu su yangangs rlom sam sum 'jun ba dang / dug tu byung po'i
i30a2('bum): yongasu skyo ba myed cid des kyang rjem sems su kyi 'gyur ba dang / ngos shes shing khres song ba la gnas kyang des kyang bus sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab khyerang chos lnga mo dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i seM so dos ra po
i30a3('bum): gsum pa la gnasams bya ba dge/ rab 'byer gzhan yang byang chub sems papa' sems dpa' chen pos pa'i pa la gnas pas// chos bcu po 'di dgas ky-i chub mo u blangs shing gnas par byaste/ re na
i30a4('bum): btang bar myi bya'o// bcu gang zho na 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung dang / chog shes pa dang / spangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa myi btang ba dang / slab sa yongasu mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan sa stong pa dang
i30a5('bum): mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems skyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / sems zhum po myed pa dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa myed pa ste/ rab 'byor nga bcu po de dag ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen
i30a6('bum): po sa bzhi po la gnas pas yongasu btang bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yongasu spang ba
i30a7('bum): bya ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di ltar khyim pa dang bston pa yongasu spong bar bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang bstend pa dang / rigs la ser sna byed pa dang 'du 'dzi'i gnas la gdon sems dang bdag bstod cing gzhan la smod pa ste/ 
i30a8('bum): drag po 'di dag ni yongasu spong bar bya'o// yang chos bco brgyad po yongasu spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongasu spang bar hU~M'o// lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dang phyin ci log rdzas
i30b1('bum): the tsom dang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug nyams su 'dor ba ste/ tshes ban+de brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen blo spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen pos sa drug la
i30b2('bum): gnas pas / chos drug yong su rdzogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug go// gzhan yang chos drug yongasu spang bar bya ste/ ches drug gang zhe na nyan thos kyi seMs yongs su spong bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi ses
i30b3('bum): yongs su spang bar bya'o// sred pa'i seMs yongasu spang bar bya'o// slongs mo ba mthong na zhum pa myed par bya ste// zhum pa'i sras yongasu spang bar bya'o// dngos po thas cad yongasu btang bas yid mi bde ba mya bya ste/ yang myi bde ba mo mu
i30b4('bum): spang bar bya'o// slongs mo ba mthong ba ni spongs ma pas 'khrug par myi bya ste/ 'khrug pa'i sems yongasu spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor da ches drug po de dag ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug la gnas pas yongs su
i30b5('bum): spang bar bya'o/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa lta gnas pas tshas nyi shu mi glang zhe na 'di lta ste bdag tu 'dzind par myi bya'o// se sa can du 'dzin par myi bya'o// srog du 'dzind par myi bya
i30b6('bum): gang zag tu 'dzind par mi bya'o// tshad par 'jand par myi ba'o// rtag par 'dzind par myi bya'o// mtshan ma'i 'du she su ma bya'o// rgyur lta ba dang / mying dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang / kaphung po la mngon par chags par
i30b7('bum): khams la mngon pa chags pa dang / skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhend pa dang / khas gsum la rten pa dang / khams la gnas par
i30b8('bum): sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos la rte nad pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / dge' 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba mngon par chags pa dang / tshul khrims la rten pa'i lha la mngon par chags
i31a1('bum): chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar zhum par 'gyurang ba dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste// rab 'byor nga chos nyi shu po de dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// ngas chos nyid shu po de dag yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na stong pa nyid yo
i31a2('bum): rdzogs par bya ba dang mtshan ma med pa mngon par du bya ba dang / smon pa myed pa shes par bya ba dang / 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa dang / seMs can thas cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang / so so con de dag le brnyas pa myi bya ba dang / chos
i31a3('bum): thas cad mnyom nyid du lta ba dang yang dag par tshul rab tu rtog cing / des rlom sem su myi bye ba dang / myi skye ba la bzung ba dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / rtog pa yang dag par spang ba
i31a4('bum): ba dang / lte ba rna bar bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnas bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa dang / drul bu'i sems dang thogs pa myed pa dang / byams pa'i skabs dang / gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor
i31a5('bum): chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po sa brgyad po la gnas pas chos bzhi pa
i31a6('bum): 'di dag yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste seMs can thams cad kyi sesas khong du chud par bya'o// mngon pa shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongasu sgrub
i31a7('bum): sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag ji lta bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor gzhin po de dag san yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen
i31a8('bum): thos brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yong su rdzogs par ste/ bzhi gang zhan 'di lta ste dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la yang dang yang
i31b1('bum): par ga' ga par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i chu ba rda ltar sgrub par gyu rang ba de lta de ltar lus yongasu skye ze byon na chang du bsnams shing srid pa nya bar len pa de/ rab 'byor chos pa'i phyi de dag ni byang chub sa
i31b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa la gnas pas yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs ho byams dpa' chen pos dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis
i31b3('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongasu bzung ba ste/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa pa de lta de ltar phun gsum tshogs paro 'gyu rang ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang ni mkha' lding dang myi'i ci dang
i31b4('bum): 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang / yongasu rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstand par shes pa dang rna ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun gsum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor du
i31b5('bum): sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing ga rgyan phu su tshogs pa dang / yon tan thas cad yongs su rdzogs par phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor
i31b6('bum): chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yong su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor nga sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de gshegs pa nyid du brjod do
i31b7('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad stsol te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsamal las stsogs pa yongasu sbyang bar gang lags
i31b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ma thas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sos bskyed pa dge'i ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdug pa 'ang ni byang chub ses dpa'
i32a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i smig ya bsam pa la stsolnga pa yangasu sbyang bar la/ da la byang chub d+ha sa nAdrAl sas dpa' chen po lasngo ldan na thams cad la sems man nyid yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam thams cad mkhyen
i32a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chang myed rtsa bzhi ste/ byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / bta snyoms mngon par sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la seMs nyes pa nyid yongasu spang
i32a3('bum): de la kyang lta ba sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i gtang ba yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa myed par sbyin pa de yongasasu gtong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sdes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs
i32a4('bum): spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen le bste/ nad par yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yang dag par bskul pa dang gzhog pa dang
i32a5('bum): rab tu gzhog pa byed pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge' ba'i smig shes gnyen te/ dge'i ga'i bshes gnyen de dag la stong pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / bra ma la phu dung bya ba ste/ 'di
i32a6('bum): byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ba'i bshed gnyen la bstand pa yongasu sbyang ba'o// de yi byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'ichis btsal ba yongasu sbyang ba zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dbang ldan gyi
i32a7('bum): sems bskyed pas chos tshol zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar myi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sa sa dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongasu sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang du
i32a8('bum): 'byung ba yongs sbyang ba'o// tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med par 'byung ba zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba yang de la bar chad myed pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang
i32b1('bum): 'byung ba yongs spyad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mis pa yos su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du sangs
i32b2('bum): rgyas yid la bya ba dang / nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chu chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongasu sbyang ba'o// de lta byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i chos rna par dbyen
i32b3('bum): ba yongasu spyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pa mngon ra te 'gyur ba'/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos snyand ba cing thog mar yang dga' bar du ya
i32b4('bum): thabla mar yang dga' ba/ yi ge bzang po don bzang po ma 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su bya ba tshangs par spyod pa 'di lta ste/ mdo' dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang tshig su bcad bya dang / ched
i32b5('bum): du brjod pa rang gleng bzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang / shinang tu rgyas pa dang tshad du 'byung ba dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang gtan la phab pa bstand pa dag la yang dag par snyan pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses da
i32b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongasu sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang rgyal dang khyengs pa bsal ba yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang khengs pa ji ltar bsal ba la des nam yang rigs
i32b7('bum): dman par mi skye ba 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khyongs po bsal ba yongasu sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste skad bstan pa
i32b8('bum): de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshogs yongasu sku'i ba'o// rab 'byor nga de dag ni byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongasu sbyang bcu'o// de la byang chub ses
i33a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyon thos dang rang snyengs rgyas k+Shi s+t+waM sa yid la myi byed cing de me yin pa tshul khrims ngan pa byed pa dang byang chub kyi gyegasu gyu rang pa'i chos gzhan dag
i33a2('bum): kyang yid la myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byis pa shes shes drin du bzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub ses dpa'
i33a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po byang chub stes dpa'i spyod spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chu ngu zhag byas kyang 'khor bAr du chud mi gasten na mang po lta na smos te/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byas pa shes shing dri na de bzo
i33a4('bum): ba'o// de lta skyes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na// sems can thams cad la gnod seMs dang myed cing 'tshe ba myed pa'i sas te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i

i33a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rab tu spro ba myong bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongasu myi btang ba gang zhe na// 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongasu skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub seMs
i33a7('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i sems can thas cad yongasu myi btang ba'o// de la byang chub sem/ sa dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon pa du ba ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems
i33a8('bum): dpa'i smad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du sems shing bdag gis seMs can re re 'i don du yang skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du seMs can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ seMs can thas cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi bkod kyi bar du
i33b1('bum): de dag tu gtub cing bshag pa dang / bdung zhing btso pa dang bsregs pa las stsogs pa nyes su myed par bya'o snyam ste// de bzhin du seMs can thas cad kyi don du sba zhing skyo ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po'o// 
i33b2('bum): snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya'o// de la byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkuro zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta bla ma rnaMs la stond pa'i 'du shesu byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
i33b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la snyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya'o de lnga byang chub skyes/ dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnaMs la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di rlo lta ste/ las gzhan
i33b4('bum): myed par sems can thas cad yongasu smyin par bya ba'i phyir las zhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa rje sa la brtson 'di tshol ba'o// de la byang chub
i33b5('bum): ses dpa' skyes dpa' chen po 'i ming du thos pas myi ngoms pa gag zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis 'jig rten gi khas 'di'i phyog bcu kun gi 'jig rten gi khasu gang ji sten pa de dag thams cad yongs
i33b6('bum): su bzung bar bya'o zhes myi ngoms pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po mang du thos pas myi ngoms pa'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i zang zing mying par chos kyi sbyin pa rnas par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 
i33b7('bum): byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyind pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i zang zing myed par chos kyi sbyin pa rnams par 'byed pa'o// 
i33b8('bum): de la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i dga' ba'i rdza bskyed cing ying su sngo ba gang zhe na/ dge' ba'i rna ba gang gis sangs rgyas pa kyi zhing yong su dag par byed cing bdag dngan na
i34a1('bum): rdzasas byanas / slod sa ma nan sa rgyas kyin sa su ra ba dig
i34a2('bum): yongasu spro ba'o// de la byang chub skyes dpa' sems dpa' min po'i dpag tu myed te gang 'khor bas/ yongasu skyeb la spyod pa gang zhe na/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brtan na sems can yong su smind par 'gyu rang ba dang / sangs
i34a3('bum): rgyas kyi nong yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsab de nye bar chog d+hA/ rim po bris cud mkhyen dag nyid yongasu rdzogs bar du nam yang skyo bar myi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i dpag/ 
i34a4('bum): tu myed pa'i 'khor bas yongs skyo bar myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpar ses dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi seMs la smod pa ste/ 'di ni byang
i34a5('bum): tshudi seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'di tshe shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' seMs dga' chen po Sh+Ti dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu myi gtang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'ad
i34a6('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i dgon pa gnas pa yongs myi btang ba'o// de la byang chub ste rjes dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dong
i34a7('bum): ma skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub skyes dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i 'dod chung ba'o// byang chub sas dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa T+Thi/ 'di ni
i34a8('bum): byang chub skyes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i byangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom po myi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo rjes la rtogs par gzhog pa bzod pa ste/ 
i34b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i rungs pa'i tan gyi sdom pa myi btang po'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i slob pa yongasu myi btang bu gang zhe na/ sgrub pa thams cad rgyu ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni/

i34b3('bum): seMs dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du bye bar myed pa ste/ 'di ni
i34b4('bum): byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o// de la byang chug sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongasu btang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos thas cad la 'dzim
i34b5('bum): pa myeng pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thas cad yong su btang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa myed pa gang zhe na/ rna bar shes pa gnas pa la de'i seMs myi gnas pas
i34b6('bum): 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa so zhum pa myed pa'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa myed pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
i34b7('bum): sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dngos po thas cad tu ltos pa myed pa'o// de la byang chub skyes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang sten pa yongasu spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
i34b8('bum): zhing du 'gro zhing rdzas te skyes pa dang 'gro grogs ning ngur skyigs kyi gos bgo' ba ste/ 'di mi byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dengabasnyend pa yongasu spang ba'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i rig
i35a1('bum): slong ma ring ba yangasu smra ba gang nan/ dge 'a slong sa dang se gos gdabs pa tsam du ldan cig myi garas zhing nga rgyus ling su skyem pa'i sas myi skyed cing de'i skyes gos 'thob par mya byeng 'dzin byang chu
i35a2('bum): sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang sten pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub seMs dpa' skyes dpa' chen po'i rigs la sir sna byed pa yongasu spang ba gang zhe na// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
i35a3('bum): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar seMs bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sos can thas cad la bde ba'i rnam pa sgrub par bya ba de dag seMs can 'di dag dang / rang gi bsod nas kyis bde bar gyu ra na de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed
i35a4('bum): par myi bya'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i TI dzi'i gnas/ yongasu spang bar bya ba
i35a5('bum): yin non// byang chub ses po mas dpa'i chen po 'du 'dzi gnas ya gyu thos pa'ang sangs rgyas mau kyi / do ga de kun pa'i gte 'byung bar 'gyur bya / dag dang ldan po'i mos bskye pa'i skye bar gyur
i35a6('bum): ris bu nga dus ses dpa sems pa chen pos gnas pa rlos bya ste/ 'di byang chub mas dpa ses chen po gas seM su gyun/ de la na di rgyang chub mos pa'i mas sa kyin po la / 
i35a7('bum): sems yongasu spang bar bya brje yin zhe na/ gnod ses dang 'tshe ba'i skabs myi 'byed cing 'thab mo'i seMs snyam brtsod pa'i seMs kyi ge myi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongasu
i35a8('bum): spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag song ba yongasu spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnaMs yang dag pararjes su mi mthong ba ste rtsa'adi ni byang chub ses dpa' sems
i35b1('bum): sa k+ShaSh+T+rIn+tu rgyas rnams yang dag pas su rgyam thang ba/ 'ang nga

i35b3('bum): gcod na 'phags pa'i le lta ci smos te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta ci smos kyang ci dgos kyis spong bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam

i35b5('bum): gyur pa'i lhag pa ci smos zhig nga rgyal du myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs spang bar bya'i de la ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs sus
i35b6('bum): bar bya ba sa na/ den 'dis dis shing sa ngas su skye ba po 'gyur pa sa bu pos pa yang ya sa par rjes myos shong ba ste'i dung chu 'isas pa'i sems pa chen po sa pa po lu sa can bya// des
i35b7('bum): byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongasu spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por myi dmyigs pa ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyi ci log rnams yongasu spang bar bya'o// de lahrI/ 
i35b8('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyams rangasu myi 'dor ba yin zhe na de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / rgyo sug kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba seM
i36a1('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i 'did chags dang ni snang dang / gti mug zhas 'angs su myi 'dor ba'o/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyis sa drug la chos drug yong su rdzogs
i36a2('bum): par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug ste/ sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas rten gyi pha
i36a3('bum): rol tu phyi rang dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
i36a4('bum): rnams shes par bya ba'o/ mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu pha nad par gyu rad to// phyin te phyin par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dres pa dang me 'ongs pa dang da ltar 'byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang 'das ma byas pa ste/ de ltar byang chub ses
i36a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' se m+b+ha dbyu' chen pos 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas nyan thos kyi seMs yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar ni byang chub
i36a6('bum): kyi le ma yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi seMs yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas sred pa'i snrums yongasu spang bar bya'o// ni/ 'di
i36a7('bum): ltar de ni byang chub kyi le ma yin pas slongs mo ba mthong ba na sa so zhum pa myi skyed do// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi la ma yin pas dngos po thos cad yongasu btang bas yid mi bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lAm ma yin pas theg mar sems

i36b1('bum): de ni lhar seMs can shinang tu myod pa'i phyir ro// sreg tu 'dzin par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog shin tu myed pa'i phyir ro/ gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub seMs pa/ 
i36b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzind par myi bya zhing na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shi nad tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang rta chad pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi

i36b4('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar myi bya zhe na de ni 'di ltar des lta bu de yang dag par rje su myi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos mying dang gzugs la mngon

i36b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar phung po la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni'i yang ltar khams rnams shi nang tu myed pa'i phyir te de ltar
i36b7('bum): khas rnams la mngon par chags pa myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skyed mched la mngon par chags par cha myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu myed pa'i phyir te de ltar skye mched rnaMs la
i36b8('bum): mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' tshem
i37a1('bum): zas ga su la mngon par chags par mya bya'o/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chu ni pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po myed cing myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ de la

i37a7('bum): se la rtend pa'i lte ba la mngon par chags par myi byar/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge na 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di lngar dge 'dun du lta ba la rten pas dge 'dun mthong
i37a8('bum): pa'i da'i te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge' 'dun la lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba mngon par chags par mi bzhes
i37b1('bum): ni tshul rje ma su lta ba la rten pas tshul khrims rnam par dag par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te// de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sras dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i sna ba la mngon chags por mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
i37b2('bum): sems dpa'i chen ngos chos nas nang nge zhes zhus par mi bzhen/ de ni 'di ltar skye rdzas cang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyes dpa chen gyis stong pa zhi
i37b3('bum): zhum par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar myi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub ses dpal
i37b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos stong nyid dang 'gal bar myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs pa ni byang chub ses da
i37b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma myed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji la

i37b7('bum): drage ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de ka ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse yong su rdzogs pa yin zhe na ta 'di lta ste snying rje chen po rab tu thob po// de la ji ltar na ba
i37b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos seMs can thams cad la brnyas pa yi zhen/ 'di sa se byas yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir re/ de la byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang nom/ 'di
i38a1('bum): dus kyi chub sems dpa' se kyi ma me po gadzin ni/ chos thams cad skye sa byung ba dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang dzin par 'du bya bskyed pa 'thod par/ das byang chub sems dpa' sem
i38a2('bum): chen po'i sgo skye ba shes pa gang sbyin pa nen/ gzu gas ba shes pa ste/ nyid ni byang chub ses rapa'i sems dpa' chen po'i myo skye ba shes pa ni// de la byang chub sems papa' ses pa tshan po chos sgyumya chu
i38a3('bum): tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na// gnyis la yongs su dri rgyub skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog tus

i38a5('bum): par spong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnams par zlog pa gang zhe na bag chags kyi 'ams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o// de la byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa'
i38a6('bum): na nas dang / lcags thong gis gzhen/ 'as so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi sa naso// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul pa'i sem so gang na
i38a7('bum): dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhen/ 'dis
i38b1('bum): sa kyi spyod cwo dus kyi tshu bya sa pa'i min pa byams pa nabs gis ga na/ mar drug go dang som sa/ de la bya chub soms dpa sems dpa tshon du'i gang du 'a
i38b2('bum): ni du 'grol gang na ni/ dzi kyi dkyil 'khri rnyed dang dag tu lung bstan par/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang mnan po'i sems rkun thams cad ses khong du chud pa zhe na/ sem sna ga cig gis sems can tham

i43b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed de// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i43b8('bum): du gnas pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rna ma thas
i44a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byorang de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te rig pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam pa'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ sna'i 'dus
i44a2('bum): reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong
i44a3('bum): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'dod pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i

i45a1('bum): nyid du gnas pa myed do// sgra na khas gsuM nas 'byung ba mya // rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myang ngo // smig rgyu ni khas gsu nas 'byung ba myed de/ rno ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sgra

i45a8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa 'pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum

i45b2('bum): tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bas rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khris gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas

i48a1('bum): ji bo nyid ni bang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyi na stobs rnams kyang ba nyid kyis spang ba'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi man kyis ga rnams kya na nyad

i48a8('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas nas 'byung ba myed ngo bas pa
i48b1('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed de/ tshad myed pa rjes kyi ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rna ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ 
i48b2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas kyi ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rna pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna bar tha rad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khrus gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thos
i48b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed de/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khas nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khas gsun mi 'byung
i48b4('bum): ba myeng che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni la rnams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pra skyed do// smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khrus gsum
i48b5('bum): wasti 'byung ba skyed do// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// ral 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phagus pa'i bden pa rjes kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyiraro// bas marnan
i48b6('bum): rnams kyang bo nyid ni bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshad rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad myed pa rjes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jig pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa'i smos
i48b7('bum): ra 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis song ma bde'i phyir ro// rno bar thar pa rnas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam pa kyi ngo bo nyid ni mthar kyis
i48b8('bum): pani snyoms par 'dug sa nas kyi ba nyid kyis song po phyi / stong gnyid kyi ngo bo 'a ni spong ba'i nyid kyis stong pa'i byin mo/ mi chan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dmatshan med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis song ba'i bya // smod pa snyed pa'i batho da/ 
i49a1('bum): na / ga man da pa tha rnams byu ba da pa rnam pa rnams 'gyu bar 'a
i49a2('bum): mi smin kyikun mas gsus nam 'thung ba myed/ sngab da ma na pa nyid du sa nas myengag ti mi pa bya ba kyims gsunas 'byung bri khyo/ tsa mas sa cad sa na pa dug so
i49a3('bum): grus kyi rnams stong ba ny-id seM mas gsunas 'byung skyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de mi byor zhe na/ 'dis mngon par shes pa nas kyi bo ba ni mdzun dzin
i49a4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// ting nge 'dzin rnas kyi ngo bo ny-id ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo nas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rjes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
i49a5('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid po myed pa'i chos nas 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mya 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myeng pa'i chos
i49a6('bum): rnam 'byung bar 'dod du pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du tha ma do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zang
i49a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khas nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa mye / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ma khas gsum nas 'byung
i49b1('bum): myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid gnas pa myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'ang ba nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myeng rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos che 'dres pa rnams
i49b2('bum): ngo bo nyid ni khas gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnaMs kyi ngo
i49b3('bum): bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni myi 'jigs pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ 
i49b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dge bcom pa zag pa zad pa
i49b5('bum): skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ring sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub ses dpa'
i49b6('bum): skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myeng ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bzhon gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
i49b7('bum): 'byor nga dgra bcom pa ya zag pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsu nas 'byung ba myedado// rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid khams gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa skyes
i49b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa/ 
i50a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi tin khas gsum 'byung ba myed de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang du gnas pa myed de/ rab 'byor du ma phyir na na/ 'ad ltar dgra brtsam pa'i du ba 'di ni u brtsam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sang pa ma
i50a2('bum): ngas rgyas kyi 'dini rangs sa rgyas kyi drithe ni myos sod pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i bu nyi na byebatu ba sems pa dzi nanyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo ma 'din tan na gshegs pa ma
i50a3('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rjes 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan
i50a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor du gang mtshan nyid myed pa 'chis rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyir ro// myi 'o ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'gyu
i50a5('bum): par 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du thar ro// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed mi dri'i chos rnams 'byung ba
i50a6('bum): 'dod pa de ni lam ga rnam par shes pa shid du 'byung bar 'dod du zang do/ rab 'byor gapomang nyid myod pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa dodo rnas ma thams cad ma khyen pa zhing du 'byung bar dong du byengad do// ngos phyir ne de/ nag kyi
i50a7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed// rnam pa thos cung mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khas gas nas 'byung ba myed do// rna pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid rje
i50a8('bum): pa myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnab thas cad mkhyen pa
i50b1('bum): na kyis song ba phyir ro// g+sa com pa nyid tu rbag ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma pa nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi mazug ni rang byang chub sa stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gi rnam shes pa nyi ni lam gyi rnam pa
i50b2('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa

i50b5('bum): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mying stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mtshan ma pa stong pa nyid ni khris gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnams
i51a1('bum): mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bda' stong pa nyid ni khams na sum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed de// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khas gsuM nas 'byung ba myang
i51a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// gdags pa stong ba nyid ni khwa gsu nas myed de/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myang stong pa nyid mying stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
i51a3('bum): mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa'i phyir// bde'i stong pa nyid ni brda' stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bdags pa stong pa nyid

i51a8('bum): ni khas gsu nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed// rna ma byung ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung bar myedo/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid gnas pa myedo// mngon par 'du bya ba skye
i51b1('bum): ba'i ba nyid ni khas nas 'byung ba myed / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myong / rab 'byor da mye phyir zhe na/ rlung rtswa ltar smra ba myeng pa ni skyo ba myong ba'i dab nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gag pa myed pa ni 'gag du
i51b2('bum): myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngabro nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// rnaM bar byang ba myed pa ni rnam par byang ba myeng bu'i dus nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mngon par 'du byas
i51b3('bum): med pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de de ltar rjes grangs 'dis ni 'di lta ltar theg pa chen po de ni khas gsum nas 'byung nas/ rnam thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas par shes bya bas
i51b4('bum): gnas de ni skyong du myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa chen po de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thas
i51b5('bum): ni myi dmyigs pa'i phyir myi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar theg pa chen po de ni myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
i51b6('bum): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
i51b7('bum): yang gnas pa yang ma yinan/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'i myi gnas pa myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
i51b8('bum): myig d+ha nas pa yang myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha bo nyid la ni gnam ma 'om gyi gnas pa myodro// bsam gyis myi khyam patsho byings kyi ngo bo nying la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myong // de ci'i phyir men// rabu 'byor de 'dis
i52a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyi'i phyir ro/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bas gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis
i52a2('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorar 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang yin/ myi gnas pa
i52a3('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor

i52a6('bum): ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni

i52b1('bum): pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zang pa'i dbyings kyis rang bzhin gyis spang ba'i phyar ro// rang byang chub pa'i dbyings rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags da

i52b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnos pa

i53a7('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myigi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'i myi gnas pa myo'o// rna ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed// sna'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gan pa

i53b1('bum): myig sa stong pa 'phyir ro// rnaM ba rnaMms song po'i phyir ro/ sA sas skyed par phyir ro/ s+ya lus stong pa'i phyir / lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yid yad kyis sang pa'i phyir// rab 'byar de 'di lta sa dper na

i59a1('bum): ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi snying pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong / 
i59a2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i
i59a3('bum): phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang
i59a4('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos
i59a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos
i59a6('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
i59a7('bum): phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa
i59a8('bum): yang ma yin no// rang gyur 'dis mer per / riya dag par spong ba rnams ni gnas pa 'angs yin gyi yinis pa lang ba yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du reg pa chen po'i yang gnas pa yang sa yin mo gdas pa
i59b1('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi
i59b2('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ dbang po rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas
i59b3('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ stobs rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang de bzhin de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i yang gnas pa yang ma yin myig
i59b4('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa ying ma yin gyi
i59b5('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorarang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang
i59b6('bum): ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ de cin phyir zhe na/ rab 'bya nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bo nyid la gnas pa'am myi gnas pa myed do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang na nyid sa ni gnas par
i59b7('bum): gnas pa myed de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi na pa rnams kyang ba du sa ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do/ dbang po rnams kyi po da la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa skyed do// slobs rnams kyi nyings ni gnas
i59b8('bum): drim gyi gnamo pa myed / phying nu kyi ya lag rnams kyi ba nyid la ni gnas pa khyim gyi gnanapa myed de/ 'phags pa'i lam zhin lag brgyad pa'i ba nyid mi ni gnas pa 'am rtses ma byed de/ 
i60a1('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byo rang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag blo rnas kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rdzu 'phrul
i60a2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi
i60a3('bum): yan lag rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'amigs
i60a4('bum): ma'ang ma yin myi gnas pa'ang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa 'ang me yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gan+da
i60a5('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad myed pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin/

i60a7('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorar de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ 
i60a8('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byorard de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
i60b1('bum): dgu ni gnas pa yang ma san ma gnas pa/ yang ma yin ne/ hA rab 'byo rad de bzhin du theg pa n+dan pa de yang ga si pras dri ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta steng de nAn rnam par tha rang ba'i sgra so
i60b2('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myeng pa dang smon pa myed pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rgyan pa 'byor rang de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang / ma yin no// rab 'byor

i60b6('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am
i60b7('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// mtha ra kyis gnas
i60b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'o sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa 'amyed do// mngon par
i61a1('bum): shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi dri ba nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am
i61a2('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir

i62a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyis spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'dabye nga 'di lta ste dra par na/ dgra bcom pa zlog pa zad pa ni gnas pa yang myi yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab

i63a1('bum): 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid phyir myi 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ci dgra bcom bya nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyi sa snang ba'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis

i63b4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mying gi ngo bo nyid mying gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid tha
