i64a7('bum): pa'i phyir ro// bam po drug pa'o// rab 'byorang rnam grangs des na theg pa de ni myi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod pa'i tshul gyis gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba
i64a8('bum): myed do// rab 'byor dgang yang khyod 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'thung bar 'gyur zhes smra ba ni theg pa des su yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa
i64b1('bum): ba de gang yin pa dang gang du 'byung bar 'i 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dngon gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thas
i64b2('bum): cad myed cing myi dmyigs na chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / srog shin rnam
i64b3('bum): par dag pa dang / 'gro ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gso' ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / skyes bu shin tu rnam par dang / gang zag shi na tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed can shin tu rnam par dag
i64b4('bum): pa dang / shed bdag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa dang / byed lo'i shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par
i64b5('bum): dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmyigs su myed do// sems can dmyigs su myed do// 'gro ba dmyigs su myed do// gso' ba dmyigs su myed do// skyes bu dmyigs su myed do// gang zag
i64b6('bum): dmyigs su myed do// shed can dmyigs su myed do/ shed bdag dmyigs su med do// byed pa 'i dmyigs su myed do// tshor ba po dmyigs su myed do// shes pa po dmyigs su myong ngo // mthong ba po dmyigs su
i64b7('bum): myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs mye
i64b8('bum): shanang du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams dmyigs su myang ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams rnams dmyig su myo/ 
i65a1('bum): shin du rnam pa dag pa'i phyir sgyu mched rnams dmyags su myang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rten cang 'bul bar 'byung ba dmyigs su myang ngo / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i
i65a2('bum): la'i pha rol du phyin pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha lang tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyind pa dmyigs su
i65a3('bum): myed do// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dmyigs su med do// shin du rnam par po'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par
i65a4('bum): dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par smra'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam
i65a5('bum): par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stong stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// 
i65a6('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir der ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su byed de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs
i65a7('bum): su myed pa'i phyir ro// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed
i65a8('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su mying ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad spong ba nyid
i65b1('bum): dmyigs su myed do// kun tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid spang pa nyid dmyigs su myed do/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa steng pa nyid dmyigs su myang ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
i65b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su mye/ 
i65b3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi// 
i65b4('bum): rkang pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan
i65b5('bum): lhag rnams dmyigs su myong / shin du rnam par dag pa'i byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bya dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmyigs su myed / 
i65b6('bum): garing du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chang byed pa rnams dmyigs su myed // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs myed pa'i sbas par 'jug
i65b7('bum): bu rnams dmyigs su byed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par tha rang pa rnams dmyigs su mye / srin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myang / 
i65b8('bum): shin tu dag rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon myeng ba pyong ba dmyigs su myong // shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon ba shes pa rnams dmyigasu byed do// 
i66a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs su myed / shin tu rnas par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su myed // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin ga
i66a2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir myi 'jigs pa rnaMs dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// 
i66a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom
i66a4('bum): ba rnams dmyig su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de
i66a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyum du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
i66a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyig su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmyig su myed do// shin tu
i66a7('bum): par dag pa'i phyir rang byang chub dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam 'drinas pa nyid da myigs su mying ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su
i66a8('bum): myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba myed pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag par dgu pa'i phyir 'ag pa med pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa myigs
i66b1('bum): su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par byang ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon pa rol 'du bya ba myed pa dmyigs su myed don kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sngo ni glo mtha' dmyigs
i66b2('bum): su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmyigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dgu pa'i phyir dra ltar byung ba dmyigs su myed de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu
i66b3('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa dmyigs su myong don shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shi 'pho dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye
i66b4('bum): dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phel ba dmyigs su myed do// gang myi dmyigs pas thams cad dmyigs su myed pa yin zhe na/ chos
i66b5('bum): kyi dbyings myi dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa mi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs pas de bzhin nyid
i66b6('bum): dmigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// yang dag pa'i mtha' myi dmyigs pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myed
i66b7('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myi dmyigs pas bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
i66b8('bum): dbyings dmyig su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dmyig su myong ba ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmyig su
i67a1('bum): myed / yin/ du rjo du sa nga ste myed rgyagapa sa myed pa ni dbyugs pa 'angs sbyin myed dbyigs pa'ang mastonano// natshang 'dre la par chung rgya
i67a2('bum): pas rten cing 'brelang par 'byung ba dmyigs su myed // de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byorarang rjen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmyigs su myed pani dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// sbyin du'i/ 
i67a3('bum): pha rol du tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pas sbyin pa'i ba ra lang du phyind pa dmyigs su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigasu myong po ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myo dmyigs
i67a4('bum): ma yag sa srin no// tshul khrims kyi pha ro la du phyin dpa m+b+ha dmyigs pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dmigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhem/ rab 'byorang tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dmyi
i67a5('bum): su myed pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor du bzod
i67a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myeng po ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myi dmyigs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyigs su myed/ 
i67a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo rang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pas bsam
i67a8('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyig su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shes rab
i67b1('bum): nA~M kyi pha rol tu nad pa myi dmyigs pas shes rab kyi pha ro mad du phyi no pa phyogs su myed // ni tso'i bIr zhe na/ ragra 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyin par myig su myong ba ni dmyigs pa yang ma
i67b2('bum): myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs
i67b3('bum): pa yang ma yang ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor daphye stong po nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa ya
i67b4('bum): ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin// 
i67b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma ye
i67b6('bum): no/ chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas chen po stong pa nyid dmyig su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// ngom
i67b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byord dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// 'dus
i67b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pas 'du byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// 'dus
i68a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pasu 'dus mi byas sang pa nyid dmyigs su myed dza/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo rang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yis
i68a2('bum): dmyigs pa 'dam yin naM/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi daphyogs pas mtha' las 'das ba nong pa nyid dmyigs su myong ngo // ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtho'i lus 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs
i68a3('bum): su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga thog
i68a4('bum): me dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
i68a5('bum): na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
i68a6('bum): rab 'byorang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myong ba ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyig su mye
i68a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas rang go mnan nying srong // 
i68a8('bum): nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmas
i68b1('bum): pas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigasu myed do// de ci'i phyir 'am/ rab 'byor nga myi dmyigs pa song pa nyid daphyogs su myong ba me rdzogs pa yang sa yon myo dmyigs pa yang ma ldan no/ dngos po myong
i68b2('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas dngos po myed pa song pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de sti'i byor zhen// rab 'byung nga dngos po myeng baspong ba nyid dmyigs su myeng buni da myigs pa yang mu yin myi dmyigs pa yang
i68b3('bum): yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi mying
i68b4('bum): pa yang ma yin no// dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pas dngos po myeng pa'i dobo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo nga dngos po myed pa'i rngon nyid zung ba nyid
i68b5('bum): dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i68b6('bum): rab 'byor du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs pas yang dag par snang ba rnams dmyigs
i68b7('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor du yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi/ 
i68b8('bum): rkang pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ rab 'byor nga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnas dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// dbang po rnams myi dmyigs pas dbang
i69a1('bum): rnams gas su nga // ra/ da rnamams phyos su myed kyi'i rgya sa pa ma yin byu myigs pa yang ma yinan/ nabs rnams myi dmyigs sa sa rnangs
i69a2('bum): dmyigs su myed de/ ngo ci'i phyir 'om/ rab 'byor nga spobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs pas byang chub kyi
i69a3('bum): yan lag rnams dmyigs su myong ngo // de ci'i phyir 'i na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs po ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/ lom myi dmyigs pas lam
i69a4('bum): dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorarang lam dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs pas 'phags pa'i bden
i69a5('bum): pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs
i69a6('bum): pas bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyis
i69a7('bum): pas tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// gzugs myeng ba'i snyoms par
i69a8('bum): 'jug rnams myi dmyigs pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams dmyigs su myong ngo // de ci'i phyir 'o ma/ rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa
i69b1('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rnam par tha ra pa rnams myi dmyigs pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga rnam par tha rang pa rnams
i69b2('bum): dmyig su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs pas mthar kyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
i69b3('bum): dmyig su myong du/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rnam par tham
i69b4('bum): pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de myigs pas smon pa myed pa rnam par ji dang da'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sngon bu dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir 'am/ rang
i69b5('bum): 'byorang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs pas
i69b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang mngon par shes rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams
i69b7('bum): byi dmyigs pas ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga ting nge rnams dmyigs su myong ba ni dmyigs pa yang ma yid myo dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phyi
i69b8('bum): meng na gdus kyi bla rnams dbyigs su myo / dbu 'byud gsus kyi rna rnams dmyigs su myed par dbyigs gapa sa yin gyi dmyigs pa sangs yi no// de bzhi gshegs pa'i slobs rnams kyi rlon
i70a1('bum): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs rnams dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma
i70a2('bum): yin no// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs pas myi 'jigs pa rnams dmyig su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ rab 'byor nga myi chags pa rnams dmyigs su myeng pa ni dmyigs pa yang mi yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/

i70a4('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pas snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yin no//

i70a6('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa myi dmyigs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang rgyun tu zhugs pa dmyigs su myong ba ni dmyigs pa

i71a1('bum): dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// rang byang chub myi dmyigs pas rang byang chub dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang rang byang chub dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi

i75a1('bum): dmyigs su myed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyig su mye dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs

i75a7('bum): su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myi
i75a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyang pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyud pa dmyigs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid
i75b1('bum): kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa / dgu pa dmyigs su myang ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myeng do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myi
i75b2('bum): don dam pa stong po nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa
i75b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
i75b4('bum): sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs
i75b5('bum): su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// nang
i75b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed
i75b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu ga dmyigs su myed do// don ngas pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
i75b8('bum): kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
i76a1('bum): kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myang ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid
i76a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myeng // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myang ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
i76a3('bum): phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do/ 
i76a4('bum): pa ni dmyigs pa'ang myi dmyigs pa 'ang yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa
i76a5('bum): gsum pa dmyigs su myong pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no/ 
i76a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmyim
i76a7('bum): ba'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam pa'i phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs
i76a8('bum): 'ad ma yin myi dmyig sde pa 'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyiris dgu pa dmigs su med pa ni dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dgu pa'i phyir sa bcu pa
i76b1('bum): dmyigs su myed pa ni dmyigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yin no// shanang tu rnam par dag pa'i nye bar bzung ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myong/ shin tu
i76b2('bum): rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung ma phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyig su myed do// 
i76b3('bum): dag pa cigs / song pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag la nye bar bzung na chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myong ngo // 
i76b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs
i76b5('bum): sbyin par bye ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha
i76b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag par nye bar bzung na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par
i76b7('bum): bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyig su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang bzhin song / 
i76b8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyi// rang sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa/ nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// 
i77a1('bum): kau 'i pa'i don kyi kyi rje mas su spya spyad na dang / nga du rnas par dag pa'i bar 'du gyid myigs paslong nga
i77a2('bum): be stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su sbyin pa bya ba dmyigs su myed // shin du rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung mdangos po snang pa sod pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam
i77a3('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i myigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bzung na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
i77a4('bum): dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid
i77a5('bum): kyi phyir sangs rgyas/ yongs su par bya ba'i dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye
i77a6('bum): bar bzung na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
i77a7('bum): dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar ba rdung na chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dge pa nye bar bzung nangon dam pa stong pa nyid
i77a8('bum): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dge par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i nye bar bzung ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ming su dag par bya ba dmyigs su byung ngo / shin tu rnam pa
i77b1('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya 'o dmyigs su myed de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 
i77b2('bum): yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su dmyed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa / 
i77b3('bum): bar bzung na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ 
i77b4('bum): bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// de shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang gi man/ 
i77b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dmigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su mye
i77b6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
i77b7('bum): su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung ma dngos po myeng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag
i77b8('bum): pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyag jing bye po su pa dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par ngas
i78a1('bum): nye bar bzung na phyi nang song po nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do/ shin tu rnam par dag pa nye byar bzung na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myang ngo // shin tu rnam par dag
i78a2('bum): nye bar bzung na chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i nye bar bzung na/ 
i78a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha' las
i78a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na dor ba myed
i78a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myong ngo // shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
i78a6('bum): zhe ldi dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par
i78a7('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag
i78a8('bum): pa nye bar bzung na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// rab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chos thams cad myi dmig
i78b1('bum): bab ba bdun pa'o// sa ni dang spa pa na kyi ma ldan 'das pa 'di/ ces gsos de/ ma pan 'das byeg pa rten bla theg pa chen po nig rna
i78b2('bum): nisku dang mid sa ma yi du rgyas pa'i 'di na rim gyis pa'i chung bar pos de'i blang du thos pa rnyeng po thug sa nan panas bgyi'o// com ldan 'as theg pa chen zi ninam mam ni
i78b3('bum): hU~M/ ste nas su mam na nas rlung/ rlung da du/ pa ra spyod srung se nga ca gas dang / cad ma pachis yinan da pam la na 'a rnam
i78b4('bum): des na/ byang chub sems de pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thig blo sngo/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ gnas pa'ang ma mchis so// sngon gyi mtha' dang / khyi ma'i mtha' dam
i78b5('bum): dbus shes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la gnas pa yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la ya
i78b6('bum): 'gro ba myi dmyigs/ 'byung ba myi dmyigs te/ gnas pa myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta dper na/ nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
i78b7('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// de bzhin du theg pa chen bro 'di yang dus/ gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' myi myigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan
i79a1('bum): 'das kyi 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam nyid kyi theg pas de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin na/ 
i79a2('bum): de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste dper ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
i79a3('bum): phyinang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpal
i79a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams
i79a5('bum): cad de/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzi na dang / seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting
i79a6('bum): nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi dbyings des
i79a7('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzind dang // rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i
i79a8('bum): ting nge lta dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam bya bar bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang // dnges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'ju/ 
i79b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshag bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i dang nge 'dzind// nga / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa'i ting du 'dzind dang / nyam pa myed pa'i nga
i79b2('bum): de 'dzini dang / chos thams cad yang dug par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzi nid dang / rgyal mtsha
i79b3('bum): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang // dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song po'i ting nge 'dzinang dang // seng ge rnam pan bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sil bzhi'i tibying dzin/ 
i79b4('bum): dang nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / rgol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
i79b5('bum): dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'an dzi na dang / 'od mtha' yas pa'i ti nge 'dzinid dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzining dang / dag pa rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od rje
i79b6('bum): ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad myi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes
i79b7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma myed pa'i ting
i79b8('bum): 'dzind dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed na pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin
i80a1('bum): dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spang ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 
i80a2('bum): chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzi ning dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / oM ge mAny+dzam
i80a3('bum): par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmyigs pa gcod lnga'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying nges par
i80a4('bum): 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzining dang / g.yo' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal
i80a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyu rang pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems myed par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / byang chub kyi
i80a6('bum): yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spobs mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thams cad la 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yongs su gcod pa skye
i80a7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas par bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin
i80a8('bum): rang du rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'a ning dang / rnam pa 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // rtogs pas srid pa'i grwa'i thams cing khong du chung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blang dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge
i80b1('bum): dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge bral ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa'o// 
i80b2('bum): mchog thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / zang myi shes pa'i tha ma tog gi ting nge 'dzi ning dang / gzungs kyi sgo
i80b3('bum): gros kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang / 
i80b4('bum): 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma'i myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od
i80b5('bum): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul
i80b6('bum): myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs myed par gzhol ba'i
i80b7('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 
i80b8('bum): ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyu rad pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind de// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
i81a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pa 'theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste// nang stong phyi nyid dang / phyi stong pa
i81a2('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
i81a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
i81a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// ra
i81a5('bum): 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
i81a6('bum): bo lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / 
i81a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
i81a8('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzi nad rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
i81b1('bum): kha bzhi dang / snying rje chen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byorarang gang yang khyod 'di skad du theg
i81b2('bum): pa de ni lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi lad kyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod
i81b3('bum): nga'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams de/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin de/ phyin ci log ma yin pa
i81b4('bum): bden pa yang dag gi ji lta bzhin du rtag cing rtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi lad kyis mnan cing
i81b5('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas
i81b6('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan mo yin pa
i81b7('bum): bzhin te/ phyi ci log ma yin pa bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / 
i81b8('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi lad kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag
i82a1('bum): cing brtan la ther zug ma smin la 'gyum pa'i chos can ta/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis rgya la dang mI dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni med kyis mnan cing 'byung / 
i82a2('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs myed pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin pa la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji la bzhin du dag cing brtan la
i82a3('bum): zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos tsan gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa 'chen po dri kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur to// rab 'byor nga gzugs med pa'i

i82a8('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor nga gal te tshor ba de bzhi ni ma nor bu de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin pa la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ rdo la
i82b1('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab

i82b4('bum): ji lta bzhin du rtag cing rten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni na theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te

i83b5('bum): brtan le ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lu dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba ya ni no// rab 'byor dgal

i84a1('bum): gal te lus de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te phyi nad ci log ma yin pa la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can

i84b1('bum): par brdzogs pa rnam par bskyed bu yongs su bsgrubs pa sngo/ myi rtag cung mya brtan ma zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos nan rje/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg chen po 'di sa lnga dang mi dang lA ma yin du btsas

i84b5('bum): btsun pa'i 'das rten rje ni yang kyis man cing 'azung ba yin no// nub 'a ga'ad dri bzhin ma nor ba bzhin gzhanam yin pa de bzhin te/ byi ni ni log ma yin la bden pa yi ni dag pa s+ho// rdol bzhin

i85a1('bum): bzhin du rtag cang brtan la thur zug mya 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing

i85b1('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can to// dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dris kyang lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te myig gi rnam par/

i85b7('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po myed pas de'i phyir/ 
i85b8('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyi lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan to// 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor nga gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin/ 
i86a1('bum): byin log ma ston la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji la bzhin du rtag cing ngam la zlar zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig sin mi// theg pa chem po 'dis kyang khwa dang mi dang snga ma yin du 'am
i86a2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang sna'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam bskyed pa yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i/ 
i86a3('bum): chos can can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg po chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lA ma yin bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhinam
i86a4('bum): nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang ba ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lta
i86a5('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zi lod kyis mnan cing 'byung myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang lce'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag

i86a7('bum): rab 'byor gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin me nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta bzhin du rtag cing brtan le ther zug
i86a8('bum): myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga lus

i86b5('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnad te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te myig de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa

i86b7('bum): 'thun tad du rab 'byo rang myig kyi 'dus te ridag pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi dag/ cing kyi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can dngas // myed pas

i87a1('bum): de reg pa de bzhi mno pa bzhin// nad pa son pa de bzhin sa blad kyi migs kyini la 'din thas nga dag pa da// des paband du gcing brtan mthag zug kyi 'gyur ba sa can nas dmi sa panan yin ni na

i100b8('bum): tshogros kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ khong du chud ba de rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis
i101a1('bum): mnan nung 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnas dngos pa yod pa zhig yan te/ dngos pa myang ba ma yin na ni/ de bzhinas
i101a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / lha ring mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan cing gzi brjid dang / dpal gi lham mor myi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ 
i101a3('bum): da myi 'gyur/ rang khyo de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas kyi myi chen pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gra'i ste sa po ma yin des/ de bo ni gA shegs pa dag pam pa
i101a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sang rgyas kyis lha dang mi dang lha mA yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnamatogazi brjid dang / dpal gas mdzes shing / lham me ldan na ljang nger 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin
i101a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ ri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i101a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i klung gi bye ma skad snang bas rgyas kyi 'od dngos po myed de dngos po ma yin pas/ ngo'i phyir de ba'i na gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gi sa
i101a7('bum): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gangs par mdzad do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i
i101a8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gsung gis glo bar myi mdzad de/ rab 'byor de bzhini gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa'i dngos po myed la dngos po ma
i101b1('bum): yin pas te de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams glang gA'i klung gi bye me snyed gsung gis go bar mdzad do// rab 'byor ga'i te ngo bzhin
i101b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod po zhig yin te// dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i101b3('bum): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar yang myi nus pa bskor bur yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin/ 
i101b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo dngos po myed de/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor
i101b5('bum): lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lta 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am// sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ rab tu bskor ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
i101b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yid pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya
i101b7('bum): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag ngos
i101b8('bum): mo myed de dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir sems can de rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu ma ngam las 'da'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rab 'a
i102a1('bum): gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// zhes smra ba ni de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de bzhin de/ theg pa/ 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dben na
i102a2('bum): nam mkha' la ni shar phyog dmyigs su myed do// lce phyogs da / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla'o// dang / phyogs marnams dbyings su myed // rab spyong de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la/ shwar phyugs
i102a3('bum): dmyigs su myed do// lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / bla dang reg dang / phyogs 'tshams dmyigs su myong ngo // de'i phyir theg pa don nam mkhan dang mnyas pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sa
i102a4('bum): na/ nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin gru bzhi ma yi ni/ mnyam pa ma yin myi mnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ 
i102a5('bum): bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin myi mnyam pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gal te'adi lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni sdor po ma yin/ srir po ma yin dmar po ma yin
i102a6('bum): kar lo ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin shel dang rdul gi kha dog du 'dug pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ leb nan ma yin shes
i102a7('bum): dang rtul gi kha dog du 'dug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa 'di na nim ma'ab dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin
i102a8('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yin pa da ltar byung ba ma yin te// de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'
i102b1('bum): 'ami sdung pas+yA nga/ 'phe' ba myed pa/ ma nga Sh+tsa ma du ga 'i rjes zib byung // tshol myod do// di sbyi kyi / ba 'dzidi ni rnaMm pa'is byo/ ma
i102b2('bum): snye na/ rnamam pa la ni nas nyan mongs paskyed do// rnam par byud byed do// rang 'byor de bzhin du ga pa na ming po mang nas nyin mongs sa kyid // bangar byung bya myed // de 'i sa po rnam
i102b3('bum): ma bya/ rab myong di sa ste nga/ u ma dang la skye / ga myed do// sa skyed ngo // nga grus pa myed // su pa 'asuganan du 'gyur ba sti sbyinasas rang byung ni ma
i102b4('bum): du sa pa snyen po de la yang skye bskyed do/ gas pa skyed do// glan sa po myed do// mdza' thug pa myed do// gnas blo mas gzhan du 'gyur ba myo myigs ste/ de'i phyir theg pa non bu do ni nim mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya
i102b5('bum): rlu 'khyor 'di lnga ste seM na nam mo 'di dge ba ma yini/ mi dge ba mi yin+te/ lung du bsnyen po ma yin no/ 'byo nan du zag pa rtson gyi yang dag po ma man/ spyi ge byem yin/ lung du bstan pa sa ma
i102b6('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po de na nim mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na ma ma Sh+Ti ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa mA yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// 
i102b7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
i102b8('bum): nam mkha'i na shes par bya ba 'ang ma yin/ shes par myi bya ba'ang ma min/ rnam par shes par bya ba 'ang ma yin// yongasu shes par bya ba 'ang mi yin// mngon du bya ba 'ang ma yin spang ba 'am yin// bsgo pa 'ang yin/ ra
i103a1('bum): myur du 'i seM byu d+hA na/ nga po byed med/ ma pa rjes pa bya ba'i masan/ yas su shes par bya ba dzim men/ mngan du du ba ma du
i103a2('bum): bla ba'angam yin/ sgom pa 'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang ma mi zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta sa dper na/ nam mnga' ni rnam par smin pa 'ang ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can yang ma
i103a3('bum): yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rnam par sbyin pa yang ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can yang mi yin te/ de'i phyira'i theg pa chen po 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnye zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
i103a4('bum): mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi khong su chud pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di ni nim gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud ba ma yi ni/ gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
i103a5('bum): chen po de yang 'dod pa'i khas kyi khongs su chung ba ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa mAM yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khrims kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes
i103a6('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'ang ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa 'di ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba 'ang ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma
i103a7('bum): sa 'a dpa ma me// ra de ba'in dge pame de na tshangs su mdun sbyin/ 'di gas pas m+b+ha yi ni/ nga sa mas ma mi snang

i103b1('bum): rgyu sa ma nga pa smre byu nga/ ma sbyin ma

i103b3('bum): ri ze rinam mnga'od tsanas zhes byang/ re 'di lta sngo dper na/ nam mang ma ni garo ma rnam par mthong ba'i sa myed de/ rigs kyis myong ro/ brgyad po'i sa myeng / mthong ba'i sa myed do// sa bras ni
i103b4('bum): sa myed do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa myed do// byas pa rtogs pa'i sa myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa skyed do// rigs kyi sa myed do// brkyang ba'i sa myed do// mthong ba'i

i103b8('bum): rgyas kyi sa myong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sa myed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis myong ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du thag pa chen po de la yang nyan thos ki sa myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do//

i104a2('bum): du yod pa mi yin/ bstan du myed pa ma yin te/ thogs pa yod pa ma yin te/ thogs pa myed pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin myi ldan pa ma/ yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gzugs

i104b4('bum): nanam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa'ang ma yin/ brjod du myed pa'ang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg po chen po de yang brjod du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha'

i105a6('bum): do pa skyed par rig par bya'o// zas bya chen po myeng pa'i phyir/ mye'i ngamang po myed par rig par bya'o// myi 'ja lang ba myong ba'i phyir/ bre sangs pa myed par rig par bya'o// myi dus pa byed pagro 'i

i105b2('bum): grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ga yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal pa gang yinas
i105b3('bum): dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thas cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorang gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir/ sems can myed par
i105b4('bum): rig par bya'o// sems can myed pa'i phyir/ srog myang bar rig par bya'o// srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o// 'gro ba myed pa'i phyir/ gso ba myed par rig par bya'o// gso ba myed pa'i phyir skas

i106a1('bum): myeng pa'i phyir byed pa po myong bar rig par bya'o// byed pa po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po myang bar rig par bya'o// tshor ba med pa'i phyir shes pa po myang par rig par bya'o// shes pa po myed pa'i phyir mthong ba pe myed par rig

i106a7('bum): yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jalang ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thas cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su ma
i106a8('bum): gyur/ ma pan pa/ pa'ang ya mas kyi na gyi'i/ sems myed pa mi ra/ ma byed pa ra/ grob
i106b1('bum): bya'o// / srog myed ba'i phyir 'gro ba myo la rig par bya'o// 'gro ba myong ba'i phyir gsalnga ba myed par rig par bya'o// gse pa myed ma'i phyir skyes bu myed par rig par bya'o// skyes bu myang ba'i phyir/ gang zag myed par
i106b2('bum): rigs par bya'o// gang zag myed pa'i phyir shed can myed par rig par bya'o// shed can myed pa'i phyir shed bdag myed par rig par bya'o// shed bdag myed pa'i phyir byed pa po myed par bya'o// byed pa po myed pa'i phyir tshor bya
i106b3('bum): po myed par rig par bya'o// tshor ba po myong ba'i phyir shes pa po myed par rig par bya'o// shis po pa myed pa'i phyir mthong ba myed par rig par bya'o// mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir/ busam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyingos myed par
i106b4('bum): rlig par bya'o// skyobasam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir gzugs myed par rig par bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i phyir tshor ba myed par bya'o// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir 'du byed par rig par bya'o// 'du byed myed kyi

i112a4('bum): rig par bya'o// shes pa po myed pa'i phyir mthong ba po myed par rig par bya'o// mthong ba po myong ba'i phyir bsam gos myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed par rig par bya'o// bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed
i112a5('bum): pa'i phyir ma rig pa myed par bya'o// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed med par rig par bya'o// 'du byed med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa myeng par rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir mying dang gzugs
i112a6('bum): myed par rig par bya'o// mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir skye mched drug med par rig par bya'o// skye mchod drug myed pa'i phyir reg pa myed par rig par ra bya'o// reg pa myed pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o// 
i112a7('bum): tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ srid pa myed par rig pAr b+ha'o/ sred pa myeng pa'i phyir len pa myeng per rig par bya'o// len pa myed pa'i phyir srid pa myed par rig par bya'o// sring po myed pa'i phyir skye ba med par rig
i112a8('bum): bar byom/ skye'i med pa'i phyir nig med par rig par bya'o na ni mying pa'i byor rnams pa' byung ba ga par byame nam por byed de'i phyir theg pa chen po myeng par rig pang ba thog po na ba sgo
i112b1('bum): byi myi ltas pa snyed pa dag pa rgya ma skyilal ba srung ba'i phyir gyi 'grus pa myong sa jug par gyuro// sasu byung sbyi phyogs pa skyed pa rig par rgya / myong thogs pa myed par bying rgyam thams

i112b9('bum): skyes bu myed de'i phyir gang zag myed par rig par byas/ kun zag myed pa'i phyi mad tun myed pa'i rig par bya'o/ snyed ca ni myed pa'i phyir shed blodag stong rje po'i rig pa rgyan
i113a1('bum): shed bad myed pa'i phyir byed pa po ni myed par rig par bya'o// byed pa po/ med pa'i phyir nor ba po med par rig par bya'o// tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o// shes pa pa myong ba'o

i117b3('bum): 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o// 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gse ba myed pa'i phyi'i skyes bu myong bar rig par bya'o// skyes bu snang ba'i phyir gang zag myong bar rig par bya'o// gang drug myed pa'i klung byin myed par rlig pa

i117b5('bum): po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po myed pa'i phyir ni/ mthong ba po myed pa'i phyi rig par bya'o// mthong ba pa med pa'i phyirabasam gso myo khyab pa'i dbyangs myed par rig par bya'o// bsaM gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed
i117b6('bum): pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa myed par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi sa myed pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa myed par rig par bya'o// brgyad pa'i sa myed pa'i phyir mthong ba'i sa myed par rig par bya'o// mthong ba po sa myed pa'i phyir srabs

i117b8('bum): ba'i sa myong ba'i phyir 'ang/ nam mkha' myed par rig par bya'o na mkha' myed pa'i phyir theg po chen po myed par rig par bya'o// theg pa chen po myed pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba myed par rig par bya'o// myi 'jal pa myed pa'i phyir
i118a1('bum): phyir myi 'grangs pa myed par rig par bya'o// myi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir myi dpogs pa myed parar rig par bya'o// myi pogs pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga rje grangs
i118a2('bum): ngos kyang theg pa chen po desas can tshang med gras med pa'i go'i bying ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngani 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sos cam gang yin pa dang srog ga yin pa dang 'gro ba gang yin pa dang gsol ba gang yin

i141b2('bum): byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang myi dmyigaso// dge ba dang myi dge ba 'ang myi dmyig so// kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang kha na ma tho ba myeng po 'ang myi dmyigs// zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa myed pa 'du myi
i141b3('bum): dmyigs// kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myeng po 'ang myi dmyig so// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'ang myi dmyig so// skye ba dang 'grag pa 'jo myi dmyigs/ 
i141b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang myi dmyigs// des rtag pa dang mo mo pa'ang myi dmyig so// blang ba dang sdug bsngal ba 'ang myi dmyig so// bdag dong bdag myed pa 'ang myi dmyigs// 
i141b5('bum): zhi ba dang ma zhi ba 'ang myi dmyigs/ 'dod pa'i khams dang 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'do' ba 'ang myi dmigs// gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i khams las yang dag par 'dar
i141b6('bum): ba yang mi dmig so// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang myi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin myi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor nga 'das pa'i gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / 
i141b7('bum): 'i phyi / slong ba nying pa las bya'i gdugs myig su myong du/ gong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyis slong dus stsogasu myed du/ spong pa 'di sa 'ongs pa'i brnags sgyur 'grom gyis kyis
i141b8('bum): 'byor nga 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmyig su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyig su mang ma/ stong pa nyid la 'as
i142a1('bum): brjid ba gags pa pa ga s+ho/ sa su gdugs sa du sa kyis dag sa/ 'a pa du nas mag su myed / 
i142a2('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis snang bas dmyig su myed na/ stong po nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ngal rje sas// rang 'byorang 'angs pa'i 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis steng ngo // de ci'i phyir na nA/ stong pa nyid la 'a
i142a3('bum): pa'i 'du byed dmyig su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis steng bas dmig su myed no// stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ 'arab 'byor 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni
i142a4('bum): 'dadus pa'i rnasngo par shes pas steng ngo // de tso'i phyir zhe na// stong pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigasu myed/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigasu myed na stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par
i142a5('bum): sa pa dartsigs pa gyur bal can skyes/ rab 'byo dus dres pa'i gzugs kyis so la gzugs kyis nga / na/ stong pa nyid sa ma 'os pa'i gzugs dmyigs
i142a6('bum): spong ba nyi stong pa ni kris seM pas rdzog su med na/ slong pa nyid sa su 'a sa pa'i gzugs skyigs par 'gyur ba ma ga suMs/ ra slong ma sa pa'i spyor pa ma
i142b1('bum): sa myig sa slo spyo 'di sal rlos du pa dbyags gyu bas cin/ stsom ma pos 'i 'du byed du 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ba slong // de ci'i phyir na/ stong banyis
i142b2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyig su myed/ stong pa nyid kyang song ba nyid kyis song bas dmi gsum ni/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci stes/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i rnam
i142b3('bum): shes pa ni ma 'dzes pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyig su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis sring pas dmyig su myed na/ stong pa nyid

i142b6('bum): ba ni da ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stedro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ro ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmig su myed/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyig su myed na// stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i cho
i142b7('bum): ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta na zhig smos/ rab 'byor de ltar ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis spong / de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmig su myong / stong pa nyid
i142b8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyig su med nas/ stong pa nyid la da ltar bya 'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci zhig spos// rab 'byor deng ltar byung ba'i 'du brengad ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis spong ngo // 
i143a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis dmyig su myed/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis steng pas dmig su myed na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs par 'a

i143a3('bum): phyug sa slongs/ ngas sgyur byung na sa nga du phyi pa'i la
i143a4('bum): sbyind pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ smind pa'i pha rol tu phyining pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmyigs/ sI nang po'i pha rolang tu phyind pa ni dus su ma mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te
