i147a5('bum): bya lta ni zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ dngas pa
i147a6('bum): myeng pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi myigs/ dngos po myang ba stong pa nyid na da ltar byung bar myi rimyigos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhem
i147a7('bum): rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmigs/ mnyam po nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam nyid kyang
i147a8('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs ma/ mnyam pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta mi zhig sos/ mo 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lnga ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lnga yang ci zhig sus
i147a9('bum): rab 'byor ngo po nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmi gus/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid ni phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngad ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus su
i147b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la nga ltar byung ba'i
i147b2('bum): dus kyang myi dmyi gos te/ mnyam panyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs po'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smosapar lnga
i147b3('bum): byang ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
i147b4('bum): pa myed pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phar zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das/ 
i147b5('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la mi 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs so/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyi ma pa nyid la myi dmigs na/ mnyam pa/ 
i147b6('bum): la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig seMs/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byodang dran po nye bar gzhag pa rnas
i147b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i me thar myi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs drin po nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsu
i147b8('bum): mnyam pa nyid lo myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus phyi dmyigs rgyu mnye ba nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnya bo nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kya
i148a1('bum): dmigs te/ mnyam pa'i kang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid lnga 'das pa'i dus dmags pa lnga ci rig smos/ ma'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig sdes/ nga ltar byung ba'i sa
i148a2('bum): dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig sbas/ rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ t+ta dge par spang ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams na de ltar byung
i148a3('bum): bar myi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir na na// rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
i148a4('bum): dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i
i148a5('bum): dmigaso pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus rimigs pa lha yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmigs// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha
i148a6('bum): myi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nod ltar byung por mi dmyigs// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang mnyam pa nyid la 'das par
i148a7('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa mi dus myo migs/ mnyam pa nyid ni da ltar byu ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
i148a8('bum): pa'i dus dmyigs pa ste ci zhig ses pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa la ci zhi ba skyes nga lar blang ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang tshe ga sus/ rab 'byor dadab po rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs
i148b1('bum): dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyig/ sna/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la
i148b2('bum): 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyonam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs// mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
i148b3('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i148b4('bum): stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams ni ji ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mnyam pa nyid la 'as
i148b5('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa
i148b6('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i148b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir/ 
i148b8('bum): na slo sa pa dus mi dgas me sa pa yong sa ma dzengs pa dris su rdzogs/ mnyim pa nyid mi sa byung ba jis kyang myo dmyigs te/ mnyam pa ny-id kyi ma
i149a1('bum): nam shA men d+hA hU~M bi yang smi gas/ 'phags pa'i las pan lag brkyang ba ning sar byung bar mye dbyugs/ 
i149a2('bum): ba'i snyam pan lag brnyed pan du'i gos sa pa 'idas mags te/ de ba'i phyir 'or/ rag nga mnyam pa nyi / 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigasamanam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i du
i149a3('bum): hUM migs tu mnam kyi nyid sde byung ba'i dus myi sas r+m+mAm+b+ha sa nga phy-i dus pa myigs pa sa kyi nag smos/ ma'i sa po'i dus dmyigs pa la ci rig go// ngal
i149a4('bum): po'i dus dmyigs pa la ci yang smos te/ rab 'byo nga 'phags pa'i bangon po rnams ni sbom go mi thar myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ 'phags
i149a5('bum): bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dus mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyi/ 
i149a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa'i nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs ma/ mnyam pa'i nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa la
i149a7('bum): ci zhig smos/ ma 'os pa'i dus dmyigs pa lnga tso zhig spos// da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa rlo zhig sos/ rab 'byor pasam gtan rnam mor sor gi mthar gyi dmigs/ bsas gtan rnams
i149b1('bum): ya m+b+hi smyi / ra rnam pa ni du drus ra myed pa rnam pa rgyu / med/ du 'byor marnam pa 'ong la 'ongs pa'i dus kyi mag
i149b2('bum): marnam pa nyid la 'dis pa'i dus m+b+ha myigs ma bskyod la la yung ba sa m+b+hi myigs ky-i/ rgyunas ny-i ngas pa'i dus dmyigs pa la mn-ig seMm ma 'os pa'i dus dmyigs pa mi ci 'ig
i149b3('bum): m+bu byung ba 'i ga la yang sa/ ra 'byor zugs snyid pa ma pa'i dzin pa rnaMm po pon kyim pa sbyinas/ gzugs snang ba'i snyoms par 'jubya ba rnamasan phyi ma'i ma
i149b4('bum): sas med pa'i goms pa 'as pa dmas su sur gyu ba ste / thugs ma du ma ga mas mongs skye
i150a1('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i rus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
i150a2('bum): dmyigs pa la yang ca zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga rnam par thard pa'i brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par thard pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ rnam par thard pa brgyad ni da ltam
i150a3('bum): byung bar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
i150a4('bum): ma 'ongs pa myi dmyigs/ mnye ba nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos
i150a5('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byord mtha rod kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rga ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i150a6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgu ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rga ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ mether kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
i150a7('bum): bar 'jug pa rgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ ro tso'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
i150a8('bum): mnye ba nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyim po nyid la myi dmyigs nang/ mnye pa nyid la 'dis pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs
i150b1('bum): khyu ma nag sas// dA myur b+hung ngu'i dus dpyugasu pa ste yang mi ni ga sos// rab 'byor nga nam+ba pAr ni rung po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang stonang pa myed pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig
i150b2('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i ste stong pa nyid dang mnan ma med pa dang smond pa myed pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs te rna bar tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang stonang pa myed pa ning ltar byung
i150b3('bum): myi myigs/ rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa 'od dang / mtshan mo med du dang sngonang pa med po ni dus gsum mamanyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab byor nga mnyam pa nyid
i150b4('bum): 'dres pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
i150b5('bum): dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smo sau/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
i150b6('bum): rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthor myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ ma
i150b7('bum): par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang mnyam po nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi
i150b8('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam po nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
i151a1('bum): smos/ ma 'odres pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smras/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byorang ting 'dzinang rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i151a2('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byang bar myi dmyigs/ ting 'dzind rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i151a3('bum): 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i du so myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung b.ra'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
i151a4('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
i151a5('bum): rab 'byorard gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gi mthar myi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigasapagazungs kyi sgo rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sku
i151a6('bum): rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmyigs
i151a7('bum): mnya pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid lo 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ minyam pa nyid la ma
i151a8('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos// mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs po lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar
i151b1('bum): myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sebs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
i151b2('bum): btsun dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang mnyam pa nyid la 'das po'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid lo ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ ma
i151b3('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
i151b4('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos de ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smoso// rab 'byor de myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mtha ro mi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma
i151b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs// myi 'jigs pa bzhi na da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam
i151b6('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam bra nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
i151b7('bum): myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
i151b8('bum): rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhin phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
i152a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
i152a2('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs dam/ mnyam pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa
i152a3('bum): lnga ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar drung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig saso/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brtse brgyad na sngon
i152a4('bum): bya mthar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rung ni de ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi
i152a5('bum): ma lus pa ci brgya na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ detso pa ni/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid 'as pa'i dus mye dmyigs/ mnyam ma rnying sa ma 'os pa
i152a6('bum): daphyogs mnyam pa 'ongs da ltar byung ba dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ gas pa nyid kyang mnyam pa 'dis kyi dmyigs batshungs byas pa'i rgyu myigs
i152a7('bum): zhes sa/ ma lem pa'i su dbyigs pa yi mi ga kyi/ sar byung ba'i du slogs pas yang ga nga na sa ma skye kyilab kyi ni 'i
i152b1('bum): skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so so 'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ so so'i ste kho ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ seMs can dmyigasu myed
i152b2('bum): pa'i phyir/ rab 'bye rod gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// nyan thos ni phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ni de ltar byung bar myi dmigs// nyan thos ni dus gsum
i152b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorang gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas
i152b4('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs// rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
i152b5('bum): dmyigasasu myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems
i152b6('bum): dpa' ni ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa'o ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// sems can dmyigasu myong ba'i phyir/ rab 'byor
i152b7('bum): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigaso/ de bzhim
i152b8('bum): gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyig su meng pa'i phyir cho / rab 'byor nga ltar byad chub sems dpa' sems rtse
i153a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyirang pa la gnas tedus gsum mnye pa nyid la bslangs shing // rna thos cad mkhyend pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ rab 'byor
i153a2('bum): 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'theg pa chen po dus gsumanye ba nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po lnga dang myi dang lha ma yin du
i153a3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan te rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
i153a4('bum): 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi bi 'di legs par gsungs pa na legs shing zhes
i153a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bsrabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ bcom ldan 'das ma
i153a6('bum): 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa 'di nying la bslabs shing rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan
i153a7('bum): 'dus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'ang nyid la

i154a1('bum): de ci'i phyir 'o na/ rang 'byor nga ni 'di ltar dge pa'i tshus gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos ram/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam sangs rgyas

i156b2('bum): tu phyind pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po stond do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po 'ang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang gzhan zhes bya ba myed do// de ltar na theg pa chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

i159a1('bum): byad myed de/ de 'a mjug pa chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brjid rgyad kyang gnyis su mang de gnyis su byad myed do// rab 'byor rnam grangs ngas na thag pa can pa dang ngalas shes
i159a2('bum): ming du da pa sang par 'gyur ro// shes ky-i pa ma sbyin pa pas pab panan po bdun par 'gyur ro// de nas cha dang san pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di nyid byam gas
i159a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'ang sngar yang byang chub sems dpa' na sngon gyi mdzar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' na phyi ma'i mthar myi dbyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su myi dmyigs te/ gzugs kun du mthal
i159a4('bum): ngas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i sla
i159a5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub
i159a6('bum): sa dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'i ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyig
i159a7('bum): so// 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'
i159a8('bum): sa dbyed de la du'angam mchis daphyogs so// bcom ston 'das de yar 'dog gis byang chu sems dpa' thams cad du banas cang rnam pa sem pa sung dag par rjes su ma mthong sa mar phyogs
i159b1('bum): chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ris du kyis yang dag par rjes sutu mthong ma dmigs mo// byang chub sems dpa' gra
i159b2('bum): zhig shes rab kyi pa ladu tu phyin pa gang la ba mas kyang bsan par bgyi/ ma ldan 'das byang chub sam sa dpa' zhes bkyi dzin mau tsam dubs s+ho/ namo ldan las ngomang bdag pa ga rgyas dgyid yang 'das pa
i159b3('bum): mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// ji ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i/ 
i159b4('bum): chos rnams la gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lnga yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta yang gang zhig mchis// gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par
i159b5('bum): grub pa'i 'du byed lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga yang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma
i159b6('bum): lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags te/ ba nim ldan 'das de ltar lags na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub du spyod par
i159b7('bum): gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bdams su mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa
i159b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'dum yongs su myi 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing yid myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag pAr myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// den du
i159b9('bum): nga mngon par mi grub pa de ni rno par shes pa ma legs te/ 
i160a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shwar da 'i dus che dang ldan par ba 'byo la 'dri na ces smras so// me dang ldan parab 'byor ba'i phyir du drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmyigs du myeng ba man
i160a2('bum): mam pa rang da tshigs su myed pa y-in/ dadus su dmyigs su myong ba stan/ tshedang ldan pa ba 'gyur ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun du mdza mas pa'i byor byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba ya
i160a3('bum): tshor ba kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mthar yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du byed du
i160a4('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
i160a5('bum): 'byor nga ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa/ 
i160a6('bum): sa bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyig
i160a7('bum): pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoraro ci'i phyir na de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na byang chubasas
i160a8('bum): dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ci'i phyir na de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ri lad kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma
i160b1('bum): dmyags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das
i160b2('bum): byang chub semasas dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord ci'i phyir na de skad ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi/ gang yang bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom
i160b3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs mngon
i160b4('bum): bye pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du shes mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa
i160b5('bum): mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par mi grub de ni gzugs ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba me lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de de ni 'du shes ma lags so// gang mdo
i160b6('bum): par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnaM pa / ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma
i160b7('bum): grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par grub pa las na yang byang chub sems dpa'
i160b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmyigs su zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang ci'i phyir na de skad du gal te de ltar bsnyen pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum yongs su myi 'dzum
i161a1('bum): 'gyed par mi 'gyur zhing yid myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras
i161a2('bum): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshwa dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// seMs
i161a3('bum): can stong pa dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i161a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sems can stong pa dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa
i161a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sems can stong pa dang sems can dben pa dang sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dubus su myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir
i161a6('bum): sems can sa myed pa dang / sems can stong pa dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// sems na
i161a7('bum): byed pa 'ang gzhan/ sems can stong pa 'ang gzhan/ sems can dben pa'ang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin myed pa'ang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan
i161a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems car myed pa gang yin pa dang / sems can spong ba gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang
i161b1('bum): sems can rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mdza'i gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed
i161b2('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dpe ldan pa sha dwa ti bu gzugs myed pa'i / phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig
i161b3('bum): so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi/ dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i byang chub
i161b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i161b5('bum): gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i161b6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i161b7('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa 'ang
i161b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa 'di gzhi yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
i162a1('bum): / mtha'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i162a2('bum): gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
i162a3('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ra myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i162a4('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i162a5('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i162a6('bum): mi dmigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i162a7('bum): dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa dang / tshar ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / 
i162a8('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan
i162b1('bum): mtshor ba rdo'i nyid myang ba 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du gzhan ma yin/ sman gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mnga' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzham yin no// 
i162b2('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra da ba ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba myed gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
i162b3('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i162b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du
i162b5('bum): shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i162b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir rkye bu byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du
i162b7('bum): shes myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i162b8('bum): so/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes dben
i163a1('bum): pra dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyags// dbus mi dmigs te/ 'du shes myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du gas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dbem pa 'angs
i163a2('bum): ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di gzhin ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan mu yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dra
i163a3('bum): shes med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
i163a4('bum): gang yin pa dang de/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma
i163a5('bum): dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa/ 
i163a6('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir
i163a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bu'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i163a8('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i163b1('bum): tshus so// 'i phyi na// nga bkur d+hati'i du 'du byed pa dang 'dug ma byung dang / 'du byed shi pa dang 'dri ngo po nyid byung ba 'i ljin gyi ma byur rtsug kyi slo ma / su
i163b2('bum): duphyogs te 'du byed myed pa'ang gzha ma yim/ 'du byed snying pa nyid kyang gzhin ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngob pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems da pa'i 'ang gzhan ma yin
i163b3('bum): gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dang
i163b4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed po bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga/ nga yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
i163b5('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i163b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par
i163b7('bum): sa pa myang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i163b8('bum): 'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'bus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par
i164a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba
i164a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmigs so/ rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba de'i nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha
i164a3('bum): dmigs so// rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i164a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi'i mthar myi dmyigs s+ho// rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i164a5('bum): rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byangachub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba de bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i164a6('bum): su myi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba myed pa dang / rna stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid myed/ pa la sngon gyi mtha' dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi
i164a7('bum): dmyog so// dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang
i164a8('bum): chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon phyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yim/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti 'u de wA ran rA bu med pa gang lam
i164b1('bum): bdab rna ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ra ba dban pa gang yin pa dang / chub dab nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
i164b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa dang gi thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar ti'i bu sa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
i164b3('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i164b4('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma'i rdzo dmyigs so/ sna dben pa'i phyir bya
i164b5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyi gas so// sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lnga stong pa nyid
i164b6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// klus snga ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i164b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bus med pa dang / nasde stong pa nyid dang / sna dben pa dang / snga ngo bo nyid myong po'i la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus mi dmyigs te/ sna myed pal
i164b8('bum): gnon mo yin / sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'di gzhin ma yin/ sngon rgya mthar
i165a1('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhadam yan/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshwa dang ldan pa shar dA ti'i bung ltar na snga med pa gang yin pa dang / sA stong panyid gang ljon pa da
i165a2('bum): snang ben pa gang yin pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid meng pa gang srin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
i165a3('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byer med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu lnga myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngor
i165a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce myed pa'i byang chub
i165a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i165a6('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lha myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig
i165a7('bum): so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhem/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i165a8('bum): lce myed pa dang / lu stong po nyid dang / lce dben pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myo dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi ngomigs te/ sde myed pa 'ang gzhan mo sem
i165b1('bum): lce stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i165b2('bum): phye ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce dben pa gang yin pa
i165b3('bum): lce ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i165b4('bum): myed de gnyis su byer myed do// tshed dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i165b5('bum): dmyigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus myed pa'i phyir
i165b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmas
i165b7('bum): so/ lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir dbus su myi
i165b8('bum): dmigs sa/ lus dpon pa phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mye migs sa/ sus nga'i 'ang byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbras su mo dmyigs so/ ci'i phyi na
i166a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa dang / lus dben pa dang lus ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyags/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus myong
i166a2('bum): ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus ngo bo nyid myong ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i166a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus glang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid
i166a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha
i166a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed/ do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
i166a6('bum): yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ yod dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ yad ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
i166a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i166a8('bum): dmyigs so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// 
i166b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir bya chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// yang snang pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mya dmyags so// yang dben pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa
i166b2('bum): dbus su myi dmigos s+ho// ying ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// // de ci'i phyir 'on/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang myi pa' dang / 
i166b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / yid dben pa dang / yod ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs te/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mid myeng pa'ang gzhan ma snyam
i166b4('bum): yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhon ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
i166b5('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid
i166b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / yid dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma
i166b7('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// 
i166b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon sbyin gyi mthar myi dmyig so/ 
i167a1('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo ga nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed
i167a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub se/ mas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems

i167a7('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma
i167a8('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzham ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa de'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa
i167b1('bum): dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
i167b2('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
i167b3('bum): sngon gyi mtha'ar myi dmyigs so// smra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra myed
i167b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i167b5('bum): dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chubo sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// / sgra med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub

i167b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ni dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra myed pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid dang / smre dben pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa lA snron gyi mar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i167b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs tanasgra myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sgra stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin sgra dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// sgra dro bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
i168a1('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tik+Sha'i bu de

i168a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub

i168b1('bum): pa nyid dang / dri dben pa dang dri ngo ba nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dri myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dri stong pa nyid kyang

i168b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthor myi dmyigs so// ro ngo bo nyid myong po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar

i168b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i169a1('bum): su myi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro
i169a2('bum): bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu med pa dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / ro dben pa
i169a3('bum): dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'i myi myigs/ bla ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus sa na/ myed pa'angaga' na ma yin/ ro spong pa nyid rgya
i169a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ ro ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhon ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang ga

i169a6('bum): yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang yin pa gang yin pa dang / ring ba nyid myeng ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gong yin pa dang / sbyin gyi mtha' kong yam pa
i169a7('bum): da phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed du gnyis su bur myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rig myed pa'i phyir byang
i169a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i169b1('bum): byi mtha' myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mya dmyigs so// reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// reg stong
i169b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myeng po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa

i169b4('bum): reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
i169b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rig myed pa dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / reg dben pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
i169b6('bum): reg myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhon ma yin/ reg dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rig ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
i169b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan dang ldan pa shar dwa
i169b8('bum): bu de ltar reg myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang reg dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i170a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon nyagi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
i170a2('bum): myed de gnyi su byar myod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i170a3('bum): sngon gi mthar mi dmyigaso// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs
i170a4('bum): chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// chos stong pa nyid kA phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// / chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos
i170a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// chos ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi myigs
i170a6('bum): ches snang ba nyid gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i170a7('bum): su myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myeng pa dang // rgyas dben pa dang / chos pa pa nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myo dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' stsa sa/ 
i170a8('bum): dngos su myi rimigs te/ rgyam myed pa 'du yin pa dang / chos snang po nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos de ba zhing mang ba 'ong gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sas pa
i170b1('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// chos myed pa gang
i170b2('bum): yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i170b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu par myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i170b4('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i170b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigaso// myi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i170b6('bum): myi dmyigaso// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i170b7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs// myig gi rnam par shes pa dro bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi rimigaso// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
i170b8('bum): sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kau phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i171a1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i171a2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ 
i171a3('bum): mo'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gyi rna bar shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan

i171b1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyig so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/

i171b3('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir

i171b5('bum): su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rna bar shes pa myed pa dang rna ba'i rnam por gos pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes

i172a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rna bar shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang

i172a6('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su mi dmyigs// sna'i rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems

i173a3('bum): shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pastong pa nyid dang / lha'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lde'i rna bar shes pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dadus myo dmyigs

i173a5('bum): byang chub seMs dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang

i173b1('bum): shes pa bo nyid myang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngan gi mthar myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rna bar shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ lus kau rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ka phyir/

i173b8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus ki rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus
i174a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ka rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngan gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i ma
i174a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi sa myed de gnyisu byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid ki rnaM bar shes pa myed pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
