i174a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs / yid ki rnaM bar shis pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ yang ki rnaM bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// yid kyi rna bar shes
i174a7('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mya rimyigs// yid ki rnam par shes pa de nyid myeng ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i174a8('bum): yid ka rnam par shes pa myed pa dang yid kau rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid ki ra bar shes pa dben pa dang / yid ki rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myong ba la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ 
i174b1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te// yid kyi rna bar shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid ki rno bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid ki rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes
i174b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i174b3('bum): bu de ltar na yin ki rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin/ yid ka rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid ki rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid ki rnam par shes ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
i174b4('bum): dang pa byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i174b5('bum): bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon nag mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// myig gi 'dus te reg pa rje kyi
i174b6('bum): nu/ myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngan ga mthar myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses
i174b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs// myig gi 'dus te rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i174b8('bum): mthar mi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te zag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te rag pa dan
i175a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myang ba'i phyir dbus su mi dmyigs// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa ga/ rad ti'i bu myog ma
i175a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmigasargya phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyis
i175a3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ong gzha na ma yin/ myig gi
i175a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa bkyi ba 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phye mi'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myig gi
i175a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang byang
i175a6('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi sa myed de gnyi su byar medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rI rI
i175a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sdong gi mthar mi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i
i175a8('bum): phyir chub sos dpa' sngon ga mthar myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon ga mthar myi dmyig so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems phyi ma'i mthar mi
i175b1('bum): dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i175b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
i175b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i175b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// de ni'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed/ ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba
i175b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te rab pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba
i175b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'di gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sos dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha
i175b7('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ran ti'i bu de ltar na// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skyed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i175b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa dang yin pa dang / byang chub sos dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / rabus
i176a1('bum): gang yin de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar ma // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// sna'i 'dus te reg
i176a2('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myang ba'i phyir byang chub
i176a3('bum): seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar mya dmigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs
i176a4('bum): sna'i 'dus de reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mnga'i mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myang ba'i phyir
i176a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso
i176a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i
i176a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus
i176a8('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben ma 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon ga mtha'
i176b1('bum): 'dra gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sI'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang
i176b2('bum): yin pa dang / sna'i dus te reg pa de ban pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
i176b3('bum): ba dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyis byar myedado// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te rag
i176b4('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lha'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i176b5('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi rimyigasaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i176b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyi
i176b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus de reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs
i176b8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang nga/ 
i177a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang
i177a2('bum): ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma
i177a3('bum): yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
i177a4('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa
i177a5('bum): dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin/ dbus gang yin pa de thas kyang gnyi su myed gnyis myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyi
i177a6('bum): so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lus kyi
i177a7('bum): 'dus te rab pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs// lus ka 'dus
i177a8('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid ka phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
i177b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// lus kyi 'dus te rag pa stong pa nyid ka phyir byang chub
i177b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmigs// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi
i177b3('bum): dmyigaso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'odus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi
i177b4('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus te reg pa myed pa 'ang
i177b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lus ka 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myang ba 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
i177b6('bum): gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus ka 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin
i177b7('bum): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te rag pa ngo bo nyid myang ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de dag zas
i177b8('bum): kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyi gso// yid 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
i178a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ yid ki 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ yid ka 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i178a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i178a3('bum): myi dmyigs// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// yid
i178a4('bum): ka 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// yid ka 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ka phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// yid ki 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
i178a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so yid ki 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid ki 'dus te reg pa'i myed pa dang yid ki
i178a6('bum): ki 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid ki
i178a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yin ka 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// yid ka'i'adus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid ka 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'ang gzhan
i178a8('bum): ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gnas na ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// mo dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi
i178b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid ka 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang kau 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
i178b2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myed// tshe dang ldan tha sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyin
i178b3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' steni ga
i178b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ 
i178b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i178b6('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myig gi
i178b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i178b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigaso/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigasaso// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ 
i179a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na
i179a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis nor ba myed pa de dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rke na kas tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kis
i179a3('bum): tshor ba dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs te/ myig gi 'dus te rag
i179a4('bum): ba'i rkyen kis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig go'i'adus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i179a5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma
i179a6('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis nor ba stong
i179a7('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba ngo bo nyid myang ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal
i179a8('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yi ming thas cad kyang gnyis myong de gnyisu bya ra med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg
i179b1('bum): pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gi mthar myi dmyogaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
i179b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
i179b3('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid ka phyir byed
i179b4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba
i179b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i179b6('bum): kas tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus
i179b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkan kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba myed pa dang / 
i179b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi
i180a1('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha myi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher ba myang ba 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher ba stang
i180a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
i180a3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan mo yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i180a4('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te
i180a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin par thas
i180a6('bum): cad kyang gnyis myed gnyis byar mye // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
i180a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg blo rkyen kis char rab dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs
i180a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i180b1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i reg pa'i rkyen kyis nor ba snang ba nyid ka phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis char ba
i180b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus
i180b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid ka phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i180b4('bum): dmyigs// sna'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa'i dbusu myi dmyigs// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i180b5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i180b6('bum): ka sa tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kas tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha
i180b7('bum): phyi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs te// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten kyis tshor ba myed pa 'di gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / sna'i
i180b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba dben pa 'di gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i181a1('bum): sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu da ltar na sna'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba myang
i181a2('bum): ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
i181a3('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyis
i181a4('bum): 'byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
i181a5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
i181a6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// lha'i 'dus pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mang ba'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i181a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar ba stong bri nyid k+Sha bI byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi mags// lha'i 'dus reg pa'i n+d+har gyis char ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sres dpa' phyi ma
i181a8('bum): mthar mi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid meng pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa'i
i181b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang kis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mya dmyagaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan kyis tsher
i181b2('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ra ci'i phyir
i181b3('bum): ma/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
i181b4('bum): dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kis tshor ba myed
i181b5('bum): ba'ang gzhan ma yin// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen pa kyis tshor ba dpon pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rtalce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis
i181b6('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan
i181b7('bum): ba sha rA dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa
i181b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myong ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sos dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
i182a1('bum): yin pa dmas cad kyang gan su myang nga gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa da'i bu lus kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rgyan kyis tshor ba myang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'
i182a2('bum): myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dbar nga'i phyir byang chub
i182a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mya dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i182a4('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// lus
i182a5('bum): ki 'dus te reg pa'i rkyem kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ lus kyi 'dus kyi te reg pa'i rkyen kyis char ba ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i182a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs// lus kI 'dus de rag pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phar/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi
i182a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// lus ki 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ lus ka 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

i182b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis char pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs

i182b3('bum): yon/ lus kau'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzha can ma yin/ sdom

i182b6('bum): ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed gnyisu byar
i182b7('bum): myong // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ling gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid gi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen kas tshor ba stong pa
i182b8('bum): ny+dza ki phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// yid ki 'dus
i183a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis char ba bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// yid ka 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar ba myed pa pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

i183a4('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso/ yid ka 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

i183a6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba myeng ba dang / yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yod gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kos tshor ba dben pa dang / yid gi 'dus

i183b4('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed/ gnyis byar myed// bam po bcugasu pa'o//

i184a1('bum): sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal

i184b6('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigaso// chu'i khams stong pa nyid ka phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myigaso// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
i184b7('bum): myi dmyigs// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// / chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'/ phyi ma'i mthar
i185a1('bum): ni/ myi dmyigasod/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid ka phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

i185a4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigaso/ de ci'i phyi re zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khas
i185a5('bum): myed pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khoms dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyis
i185a6('bum): te// chu'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/

i185a8('bum): chu'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang // chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed
i185b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon ga mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed/ 
i185b2('bum): gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// mye'i khams stong pa nyid gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gau
i185b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigaso// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
i185b4('bum): myi dmigaso// mye'o kha mas myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// mye'i khams stong pa nyid ka phyir/ byang chug sems dpa'/ phyi ma'i mthar
i185b5('bum): myo myigs// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phra ma'i mthar myi dmyig sa// mye'i khams ngo bo nyid meng ba'i dri/ byang chub sems dpa'/ phyi ma'i mtha
i185b6('bum): dmyigs/ me'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'adabus myi dmyigaso// mye'i khams stong pa nyid gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ma dbus
i185b7('bum): myi dmyigaso// myo'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs sa// mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i185b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i buH/ mye'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid dang mye'i khams dben pa dang / mye'i khams nga pa nyid myed pa
i186a1('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi/ dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mya'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i186a2('bum): ma yin/ mye'i khams dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i186a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ mye'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang // mye'i khams
i186a4('bum): sngon pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myang ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
i186a5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang // phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu// rlung gi
i186a6('bum): khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'/ sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
i186a7('bum): rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i186a8('bum): dmyigs// rlung gi khams myang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'aphyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rlung gi khams sdang ba nyid ka phyir phyi me'i mthar gyi
i186b1('bum): dmyigaso// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i186b2('bum): rlu gi khams myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems pa / dbus myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi bIr+ya byung chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i186b3('bum): rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'adabus
i186b4('bum): su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams myed pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben
i186b5('bum): ba dang rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' tsa myi dmyigasadabus myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams myed pa 'a
i186b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams sdang po nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa 'od gzhan ma yin byang chub
i186b7('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i186b8('bum): de ltar na/ rlung gi khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i187a1('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
i187a2('bum): gnyi su med de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// nam mkha'i khams stong
i187a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigase// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// nam mkha
i187a4('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// nam mkha'a'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// nam mkha'
i187a5('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// nam mkha'i nam khams dben pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i187a6('bum): nam mkha' khams ngo bo nyid myang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// nam mkho'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal/ dbus
i187a7('bum): myi dmig so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmigasor/ nam mkha'a'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o/ dbus
i187a8('bum): mya rimigs// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su mi dmigasade ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam
i187b1('bum): mkha'a'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'a'i stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha' 'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'a'i ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
i187b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin pa/ nam
i187b3('bum): mkha'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'a'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon ga
i187b4('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin / dbu su kyang gzhan ma yin// // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu/ de ltar na nam mkha'i
i187b5('bum): 'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang nam mkha'a'i khams dben pa gang yin dang
i187b6('bum): nam mkha'o'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' ga
i187b7('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa shes pa'i khams mye bo'i phyir/ 
i187b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// rnam pa shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs
i188a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i188a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i188a3('bum): mtha rad mi dmyigaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
i188a4('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi
i188a5('bum): dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par
i188a6('bum): shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs
i188a7('bum): te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
i188a8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'pha gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
i188b1('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang mdzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa
i188b2('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang nyi su med
i188b3('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar gyi
i188b4('bum): dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myong
i188b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyig so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
i188b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigaso// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigaso/ ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i dbus su myi dmyig so// ma rig pa
i188b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmig+ha sau/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i188b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ljon pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / mi rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myang ba la sngon gyi mtha' mi
i189a1('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa dben pa'
i189a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i189a3('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa yang
i189a4('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byor medo// 
i189a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtho migs// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'du byed dben pa'i
i189a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig sa/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha rang myi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i189a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid
i189a8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mu'i myi dmigs/ 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ 'du byed ben
i189b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed steng
i189b2('bum): pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs/ 'du byed 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid
i189b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i189b4('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du
i189b5('bum): byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi'i maldar gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu
i189b6('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa stod kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// rnam par shes
i189b7('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna bar shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i189b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// rna bar shes pa
i190a1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
i190a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
i190a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i190a4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma de yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i190a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa myeng pa gang
i190a6('bum): ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa de ban pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
i190a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar mye // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i190a8('bum): dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi myi gso/ mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i190b1('bum): myi dmyig so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi da myi gas/ mying dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyig se
i190b2('bum): myong dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid
i190b3('bum): myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i190b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus su mi/ dmigaso/ mying dang gzugs ngo bro nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs
i190b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mying dang gzugs dadzi na po dang / myong dang gzugs ngo blo myed pa'i phyir la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar
i190b6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ myi dang gzugs ngo bo
i190b7('bum): nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gcazhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i190b8('bum): 'i bu de ltar na myi dang gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
i191a1('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / du byas gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myeng // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa di'i
i191a2('bum): bu skyed mched drug myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i191a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar pa myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mthar myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug stong pa
i191a4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
i191a5('bum): myi dmyig so// skye mched drug myed rtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dbus myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i191a6('bum): su mi dmig so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa'i ga ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug myed pa dang / skyed mched drug stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug
i191a7('bum): dben pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigaso// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
i191b1('bum): mched drug dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug nga ba nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
i191b2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye mched drug glang yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i191b3('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i191b4('bum): reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigaso// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
i191b5('bum): myi dmyigaso// reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems phyi ma'i
i191b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ reg pa pa pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i191b7('bum): dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i191b8('bum): dpa' dbus mi dmigs de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa myed pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyidi med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i192a1('bum): mya dmigs/ dbus mya dmags te/ reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa snang ba nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa nga ba nyid myed pa'ang gzhan
i192a2('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'daga'an ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma mim// che dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bud skar na reg pa myed pa gang yin
i192a3('bum): pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa de gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
i192a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed de gnyis byar myang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmig so// tshor ba stong pa nyid
i192a5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmigs// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// 
i192a6('bum): tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigaso// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar
i192a7('bum): ming mag / tshor bab pa nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang nub sems dopa'i dbus phyi dmyigs/ tshor ba stong ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
i192a8('bum): dbus su su migs/ nor ba bor pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dastsogs tshor ba babad myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pag
i192b1('bum): da'i bu mar babyed pa dang / tshor bas ny-id dang / tshar ba ben pa dang / char ba ba rang ba la sngun ga la tham ma dmyig tshul pom tho mo dmyogs dngos myo dmyogs te/ tsa ba skyeng pa 'angs
i192b2('bum): mayin/ tshar bsnang banyid kyang bsha ma yin/ tshar ba dag pa'ang ga pa yin/ tshor ba ba nyid bye pa nga ga yin/ dri chus ma gzhas so/ na rnaM sa gnanam
i192b3('bum): bye ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yid/ dbus kyang gzhan ma med// medang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu lta na tshar ba med pa gang min pa dang / ra ba sang bany-id gang yin pa dang / tshar ba na pa gang rin pa
i192b4('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myong
i192b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so/ sred pa da sod gang gyi/ phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs kyi chu 'o ma
i192b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myigs/ srang ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig
i192b7('bum): so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs/ sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i192b8('bum): mtha dbus mo dmig so/ phreng pa srang banyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' bras su myi dmyigs/ spong ba ban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa dbus su myi dmyis mo / srid pa do ba nyid myeng pa'i phyir
i193a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa myed pa dang // sred pa stong pa nyid dang / sred pa dben pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la
i193a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sred pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
i193a3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sred pa myed pa ga
i193a4('bum): yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
i193a5('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
i193a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs/ len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i193a7('bum): len pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi myigaso/ len pa snang ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha
i193a8('bum): myi dmyigasas/ len pa banyid byed med pa'i phyir drang chubasas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ le pa med pa'i phyir byang chub rnams dpa' da bsu mi dpags/ lan po song bcid kyi phyir byang chub sas pa
i193b1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigaso// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i193b2('bum): len pa myed pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid dang / len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ len pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ len pa
i193b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa ngo bo nyid myong pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan
i193b4('bum): ma yin tedabus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na len pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i193b5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin bu dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su myed do// tshe dang ldan dwa ti'i bu srid pa myed
i193b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngoran gyi myi dmyigaso// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs su
i193b7('bum): srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ srid pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi
i193b8('bum): mthar mi dmyigs/ srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ srid po nga bo nyid mye mi ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ sring pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i194a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus sa myi dmyigs/ sring bsrung ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sams dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mye dmyinyam/ srid ba ba nyid myi
i194a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa med pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngo gyi mtha' myi
i194a3('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ srid pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan
i194a4('bum): yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin nano// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na srid pa myed pa gang yin pa
i194a5('bum): dang / srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang // srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i/ mtha'
i194a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// skye ba stong pa nyid
i194a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so
i194a8('bum): skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// ska ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha
i194b1('bum): myi dmyig so// skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyira'i mtham myi dmyigs/ skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i194b2('bum): su myi dmyigs/ skye ba deben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// skye ba ngo bo nyid du myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// de ci li ra phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
i194b3('bum): bu skye ba myed pa dang / skye ba rgya stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthe'i myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye ba myed kyi yang gzhan ma yin
i194b4('bum): skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ na phyi ma'i mtha
i194b5('bum): 'ong gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan mo yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni skye ba myed pa dang gad ma yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid
i194b6('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de gnyis myed gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
i194b7('bum): rmi shi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chun sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigaso// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sum gyi mthar myi myong
i194b8('bum): so// rga shi ngo bo nyid na myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i195a1('bum): mthar mya dmyigs/ rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rga shing bo nyid myang pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rga shi myed pa
i195a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub de bus su myi dmyigs/ rga shi dben pa'i dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ rga gong ba nyid
i195a3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa la snga
i195a4('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo
i195a5('bum): nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma nga yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
i195a6('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na rga shi myed pa rgyu gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang
i195a7('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar myong / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i195a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigaso/ smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems sngon
i195b1('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigs// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i195b2('bum): myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ 
i195b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chubs sems dpa' dbus myi dmyig so// sbyin pa'i phyi
i195b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i195b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyinan
i195b6('bum): pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
i195b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa can dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ smyon pa'i pha rol du nad pa bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sas
i195b8('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yon/ sngon gi mtha' 'daga'anam yim/ dri ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan mo yin ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na smin pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa
i196a1('bum): gang yin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa glang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
i196a2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu myed de gnyisu bar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims
i196a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha
i196a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyir mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims
i196a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigaso// tshul khrims kyi
i196a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi
i196a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i196a8('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ tshul khrims gi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya na la nga ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir ma
i196b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
i196b2('bum): tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i196b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan
i196b4('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i196b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/ 
i196b6('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phye ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams kyang gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed
i196b7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
i196b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i
i197a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rolal tu phyin pa snang ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa
i197a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir
i197a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub semaHsa dpa' dbusu myi dmyig so// bzod pa'i pha rol ba tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub dbus su myi dmyigaso
i197a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
i197a5('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo ta nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bzod
i197a6('bum): pa'i pha rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
i197a7('bum): phyi nad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rdzadabus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang
i197a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa de'i ts+tsha ba de ltar na bzod pa'i pha ro lang du zin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i phar lang tu phyind pa stong bshing dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang can pa gang yin pa dang / ba
i197b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gung yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar
i197b2('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal
i197b3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i197b4('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myed pa'i phyir bya nga chu de sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i197b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i197b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i197b7('bum): sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga bo nyid myang ba'i phyir byang chub sems
i197b8('bum): dbus su mi dmyigs/ ngo bo'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa spong ba nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyin pa dben pa dang / 
i198a1('bum): brtson 'grun gyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan ma yin
i198a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
i198a3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang
i198a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa gang yid pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
i198a5('bum): sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phye ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis byar mya // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bas gartan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir
i198a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyig so// bsam gartan gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' stom
i198a7('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// bas gartan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i198a8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ bsam gartan garten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyira'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bas gartan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i198b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam garten gyi pha rold tu phyin pa de bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// bsam garten gyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir
i198b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ bas gartan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang
i198b3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ bsam gartan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ de ci'i ci phyir tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu bsam gartan gyi pha rol
i198b4('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa dang bsam gi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po ngo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma
i198b5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam rten gyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam rten gyi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyin kyang gzhan ma yin/ bas rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i198b6('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam garten gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang
i198b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bsam rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam garten gyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i198b8('bum): bsasarten gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / bas brtan gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
i199a1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar gang yin dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar mye dang// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sa
i199a2('bum): dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmigaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigaso/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i199a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmigaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyig so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i199a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyig so/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
i199a5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su
i199a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs
