i199a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi 'amig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / shes
i199a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa dngon pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i199b1('bum): myi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
i199b2('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma smin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i199b3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa stong pa nyid gang yin
i199b4('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i199b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// / tshe dang ldan pa shar
i199b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ nang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i199b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// nang stong ba nyid ngo khri nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i199b8('bum): dmigaso// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigaso/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs/ nang stong ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sas
i200a1('bum): dpa' dbusu ma dmyigs mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa snang ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myo dmyags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i skams par
i200a2('bum): 'dug pa dab pa byor byang chub sems dpa' dadus su myi dmams// mthar gyis banas pa na 'i rnams par 'dug pa banyid myed pa'i phor bang chub sems dpa' dadus su dmyibs// kyi phyi/ 
i200a3('bum): mdang ldan pag da do'i dumazar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa skyed pa dang / mthar kyis banas pan sems par 'dug pa snang ba'i dang / mthun gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa
i200a4('bum): dben pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de ba nyid myed pa la stan g.yo bar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar gyis gams pa'i
i200a5('bum): skyems par 'dus pa snang pa yang ga' ya / skar kyis brnas pa'i rnams par 'dug pa song banyid kyang bsam non/ \u0f7f kyis pa sa pa'i rnams par 'jug pa be pa mdu
i200a6('bum): mas pa rnams par ga pa ba tshang med pa yang na / byang chub sems dpa' yang gam
i200a7('bum): mthar 'ang gzhanam yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dkyus kyang gzha ma yin// chu dang ldan pag ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug
i200a8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / ba gyis pa/ sa pa'i snam su gdung / sa bangs pa rnams par 'dug pa bar ba ga smon pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa rnams par 'du
i200b1('bum): bye bo nyid myang ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed
i200b2('bum): gnyis su byar myed/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i200b3('bum): rnam par tho rang po'i sde stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smin pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ 
i200b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha ring ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smin pa myed pa ngo bo
i200b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
i200b6('bum): dmyigaso// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
i200b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i/ 
i200b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myong ba'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus su myi dmigs/ 
i201a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'o sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
i201a2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyigaso// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyidang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
i201a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smom pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
i201a4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
i201a5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed bla lu sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ ded bus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smom pa med
i201a6('bum): pa myed pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yini/ rno bar tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
i201a7('bum): smon pa med pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
i201a8('bum): sngon po mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
i201b1('bum): smon pa myed pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myang ba dang / sman pa mang bla glang yin pa pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma myang ba dang
i201b2('bum): smon pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma myed pa dang / smom pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gang yin pa dang
i201b3('bum): sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de gnyi su myed de/ gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i201b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigaso/ mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' sngon gi mtha
i201b5('bum): myi dmyigs// mngon par shes pa stong pa phyi / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i201b6('bum): mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'o phyir
i201b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi nga myi dmyigs// mngon par shes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su myi dmyi dmyigs// / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i201b8('bum): mi dmyigs// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus bu myi dmyigs// mngon par shes pa nga ba nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbu su ma'i dmigs/ de ci'i phyir / 
i202a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon ga
i202a2('bum): mtha' mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dben
i202a3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pas ca ba yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i202a4('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mngon par shes pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes
i202a5('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis nga mye // 
i202a6('bum): gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ti nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ ting nge 'dzin stong ba nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon pa mthar mi
i202a7('bum): dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin pan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'drin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i202a8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mo dmigaso// ting nge 'dzin nges pa'i phor byang chub sems dpa' phye ma'i mthar mi dmyigs
i202b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// ting nge 'dzin / kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i202b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/ 
i202b3('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa di'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
i202b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ti nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa
i202b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin myed gang yin
i202b6('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sde ma chagi mtha'
i202b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de gnyis su myed gnyis byar myedado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i202b8('bum): gi mthar mi dmigaso// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go ma tha rang mi dmyigaso/ 
i203a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// / gzungs kyi sgo nyid rna ba'i phyir byang chub sems raba'i phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i203a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthur myi dmyigaso/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid
i203a3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi mthar myi dmigs/ gsus kyis myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ngos myi dmyigs/ gzus kyi ste stong po zhid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i203a4('bum): dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigaso// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i203a5('bum): da ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myong ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gi mtha'
i203a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa yang
i203a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ gzus kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
i203a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yis/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// mdang ldam pa sha ra dwa tri'i bu de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo med pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i203b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs go sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon go mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin/ 
i203b2('bum): ba dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams kyang gnyisu ming gnyi su byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi
i203b3('bum): dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
i203b4('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigaso/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos/ 
i203b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'o mthar myi dmyigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs stong pa nyid kyi phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i203b6('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs bya'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs myong ba'i phyir byang chub sas dpa' dbus myi dmyings
i203b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu myi dmyigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// 
i203b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa dang / 
i204a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyidang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nga bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
i204a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs stong pa nyid kyang ka zhan ma yin/ nga bzhim ga shegs pa
i204a3('bum): stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma
i204a4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i204a5('bum): stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sa ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs rab gang yin pa dang / 
i204a6('bum): sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi sa myed gnyi su byar ma // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir
i204a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigaso// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i204a8('bum): sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigaso// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i204b1('bum): myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/ myi 'jigs
i204b2('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i204b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi daphyis
i204b4('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa myong ba dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa dben pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sdom gi mthar
i204b5('bum): myi dmyigaso/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa dben pa yang
i204b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang
i204b7('bum): gzhan ma yin// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myi 'jigs pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa gang yin pa dang myi 'jigs pa
i204b8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon go mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyis
i205a1('bum): byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ se so yang dag par rig pa stong ba nyid kyi
i205a2('bum): phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sdong gi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa
i205a3('bum): phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i205a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
i205a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i205a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus myi rimigs/ seM sa yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sas da
i205a7('bum): dbusu mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dgra par rig pa dben pa
i205a8('bum): da / sa so ma ras par ris pa nga ma nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mo dmyigs/ dbus myi rimigs / sa sa yang dag par rig pa lung gzhanam yinan
i205b1('bum): yang dag pararig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal
i205b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na so so yang dag par rig
i205b3('bum): ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yi
i205b4('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myeng // tshe dang / 
i205b5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i205b6('bum): rje chen po'i dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// snying rje chen po myed pa'i
i205b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub so sa dpa'
i205b8('bum): snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so// snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu myi dmigs/ snying rje chen po spong ba nyid kyi phyir
i206a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus mya dmyigs/ snang pa dan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ snying rdza ches pang bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu
i206a2('bum): dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid / snying rje chen po dben pa dang / snying rje chen po bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
i206a3('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po dben pa yang ga
i206a4('bum): ma yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyang
i206a5('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na snying rje myed pa gang yin dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po de nyid med pa
i206a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myed do// 
i206a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sos
i206a8('bum): dpa' sngon gi mithar mi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmigs ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 'phob nying med pa'i phyir bya
i206b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong
i206b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
i206b3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa'i dbus myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa stong pa
i206b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myang
i206b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myeng pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs
i206b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
i206b7('bum): 'dres pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
i206b8('bum): popo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon go mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang ga'am yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ 
i207a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sangs kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yitshan dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ma 'dres pa
i207a2('bum): ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang ba dang dbus
i207a3('bum): gang yin pa de tha cad kyang gnyisu myed gnyi su byar med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i207a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmigs// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
i207a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dbyings dpe ldan pa'i phyir byang nu
i207a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i207a7('bum): dmyigaso// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigasaso// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus myi dmyigaso// chos kyi dbying skyes ngo bo nyid myed pa
i207a8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bachos ti bangs song ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings pa nyid med pa'i la
i207b1('bum): gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ 'phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos kyi dbyings myeng pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i
i207b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i207b3('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dpyong
i207b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin dpa / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyis byar myed/ 
i207b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar pa myi dmyigaso/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmigs
i207b6('bum): de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems sngon gi mthar myi dmigs/ de bzhin nying bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i207b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin nyid nga bo nyid
i207b8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ de ba'i mi nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myo nga langs/ de bzhin 'di stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su ma
i208a1('bum): dmyigs/ de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ de bzhin nyid nga bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhen
i208a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
i208a3('bum): myi dmyigs te// de bzhin nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
i208a4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngan gi mtha' ya ga mams phyi ma'i mtha' mang na 'dim dzan/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ de bzhin nyid myed
i208a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / de bzhin cing stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin bu gang yin pa dang / dra bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid rgyud yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin+d+ra pA dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i208a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myed// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang dag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar
i208a7('bum): myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ yang ngag
i208a8('bum): pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso// yang dag pa'i mtha' sa
i208b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i208b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu su
i208b3('bum): myi dmyigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// yang dag pa'i mtha' ba ga nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir
i208b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag bla'i myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' myong ba'i phyir byang chub stong ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sdom
i208b5('bum): gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mom kyis sa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dab ngan pa yang gzhan ma
i208b6('bum): yin/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyi myeng pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngun gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma ya
i208b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
i208b8('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar
i209a1('bum): myed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bas gos myi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmigs/ bas gis myi khyabs pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid
i209a2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// bas gis myi khyab pa'i ba'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ bas gis myi khyaba'i dbyangs ngo bo nyid
i209a3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// bas gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso/ bas gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i209a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bas gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i209a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// bas gyis myi khyab pa'i bya pa'i dbyings stong nyid kyi phyir byang chu
i209a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings nga ba nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu
i209a7('bum): dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang / bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong ba nyid dang / bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bas gos rgya
i209a8('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon sngon gi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bas gis myi khyab pa'i
i209b1('bum): dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bas kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myang ba yang gzhan yin/ byang chub ses dpa' yang gzhan yan/ 
i209b2('bum): sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bas gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i209b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin dang / bas gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin dang / byang chub seMs pa
i209b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nyan thas
i209b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' sngon gyi
i209b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmigs/ nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthur myi dmyigs/ nyan thos stong pa nyid
i209b7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
i209b8('bum): mthar mi dmigs/ nyan tho med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ nyon thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmigs/ nyan thas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa
i210a1('bum): dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa bi'i bu nyan thos myeng pa dang / 1
i210a2('bum): thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben dang / nyan thos pa bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' mi dmyigs/ bi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nyan thos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin nyan
i210a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo ba nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma
i210a4('bum): yinaphyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin dang / nyan thos dben pa
i210a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon ga mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa thams cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myeng // 
i210a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub stan gi mthar mi dmyigs
i210a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas myed
i210a8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang sangs rgyas sdang ba nyid phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma 'i
i210b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// rang sangs
i210b2('bum): rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myigaso// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' dbus myi dmyigs// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa'
i210b3('bum): dbusu myi dmyigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sa su stong pa nyid dang / rangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa la sdon
i210b4('bum): gi mtha' ma dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas
i210b5('bum): bden pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
i210b6('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rang sangs rgyas myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa gang
i210b7('bum): yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
i210b8('bum): de thas cad gnyi su myed gnyis byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gyi ri mthar myi dmyigaso// byang chub sems
i211a1('bum): dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigaso// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
i211a2('bum): byang chub sos dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon ga mthar myo rimigs/ byang chub seMs dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem pa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub
i211a3('bum): sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub seMs dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myigaso// byang chub sems dpa'
i211a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi
i211a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// byang chub ses dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigaso// byang chub sos dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa'
i211a6('bum): dbusu myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' myed pa dang / byang chub sos dpa' stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / 
i211a7('bum): byang chub sos dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'i myi dmyigs ka dbus mi dmyigs te/ byang chub sos dpa' myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
i211a8('bum): dpa' stong pa nyid kyang bzhin ma yin/ byang chub sos dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub seMs dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sos dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
i211b1('bum): gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gnas ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' myang ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub
i211b2('bum): seMs dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sas dpa' ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha'
i211b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed
i211b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar mi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
i211b5('bum): byang chub ses dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i211b6('bum): sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sos dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa'
i211b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs
i211b8('bum): thas cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi byang chub sos dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' dbusu mi migs// / thas cad mkhyen pa 'di myed pa'i
i212a1('bum): phyir byang chub sas dpa' dbusu myi dmyigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myang ba dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ba nyid dang // 
i212a2('bum): thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngan gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa yang
i212a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhanam yin 2/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa mi yang gzha
i212a4('bum): yin/ byang chub seMs dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// 
i212a5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang // thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thas cad mkhyend pa nyid ngo bo nyid gang yin
i212a6('bum): ba dang / byang chub seMs dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phye ma'i mtha' gang yin dang / dbus gang yin pa de thas cad kyang gnyi su myed gnyi su gnyi su byar myed do// 
i212a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna gang des na/ byang chub seMs dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigaso// byang chub ses dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sos dpa' dbusu myi dmyigaso// 
i212a8('bum): kha po bcu drug pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di skad du ni li phyir zhe na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa'
i212b1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang / mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta/ 
i212b2('bum): ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// 
i212b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid mtha' dbus
i212b4('bum): myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na grangs des na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di gang 'a
i212b5('bum): skad du ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba ni na mkha' dang ma
i212b6('bum): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
i212b7('bum): na mkha' zhen myi du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid
i212b8('bum): la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna gras des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig sa ga par bya'o// gang yang
i213a1('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes ni na
i213a2('bum): mkha' dang mnya pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
i213a3('bum): na mtha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du shes kyi sngon gi mtha' mying myigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
i213a4('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'a dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ 
i213a5('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byed na ni dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i
i213a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du ba
i213a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed kyi sngon gi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
i213a8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu rna grangs des na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sos dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ 
i213b1('bum): na rna par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rno par shes ni na mtha' dang mnya pa ste/ de ci'i
i213b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du
i213b3('bum): brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna par shes pa'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid
i213b4('bum): la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yos pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang
i213b5('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni na mkha' dang mnye
i213b6('bum): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyu dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' rje
i213b7('bum): mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigs/ 
i213b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
i214a1('bum): byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba na mkha' dang mnya ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ma
i214a2('bum): sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mtha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rna ba stong
i214a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na grangs des na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sa
i214a4('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i214a5('bum): sna na ni mkha' dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyig k+Sha~Ms/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu rgyu mtha'
i214a6('bum): yis pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du snang ba nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i sngon gi mtha' myi rimyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myigs te/ stong pa
i214a7('bum): nyid la mtha' 'a dbus myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du
i214a8('bum): ci'i phyir na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i na mkha' dang mnya ba ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i214b1('bum): 'di ltar dpon na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' mya dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes myong du brjod do// cha dang
i214b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'a dbus myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
i214b3('bum): dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus kun tu mtha' pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
i214b4('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus ni ni mkha' dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dpen/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs
i214b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ na mkha' zhes myong du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu de bzhin dus lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus
i214b6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas
i214b7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub chosas dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes
i214b8('bum): ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu yid ni na mkha' dang man pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngun gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus mya rimyigs
i215a1('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa po'i bu de bzhin du yi stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid sngon gi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mya
i215a2('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na grangs des na yin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
i215a3('bum): rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni ni mkha' dang mnya
i215a4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying
i215a5('bum): du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
i215a6('bum): dbusasu myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir
i215a7('bum): na sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra ni na mkha' dang man pa ste/ nga ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar dper na
i215a8('bum): na mkha' la ni sngon pa mtha' mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus mi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyi ri nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
i215b1('bum): bu de bzhin du sgra stong ba nyid kyi phyir sgra'i sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'a' dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i215b2('bum): grangs des na/ sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
i215b3('bum): par rig par bya'os zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri ni nim mkha' dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' lan sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i215b4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i de bzhin du dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir dri sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i215b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' dbus mya rimyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs des na/ dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'dis
i215b6('bum): du ci'i phyir na ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro na nim mkha' dang mkha' dang mnyapa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
i215b7('bum): na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa ga rA dwa ti'i bu ro stong pa

i216a1('bum): phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du de ci'i phyir zhe na reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba /

i216a4('bum): la mtha' 'i dbus myi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na grangs des na reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ 'di ltar dper na

i216a6('bum): gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir na mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// ma dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi phyir

i216a8('bum): sos dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na myig gi rna bar shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan
i216b1('bum): di sha ra dwa ti 'i bu myig gi rna bar shes pa ni na mkha' dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon go mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'

i216b3('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' la dbus mya dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna gangs des na/ myig gi rna bar shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
i216b4('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na rna ba'i rna bar shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes
i216b5('bum): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rna par shes pa ni na mkha' dang mnye ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyog
i216b6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir ma mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rna ba'i rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i
i216b7('bum): par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' la dbus myi dmyigs// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna grangs ngas
i216b8('bum): rna ba'i rno bar shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yams par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na sna'i rno bar shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa
i217a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rna bar shes pa na mkha' dang man pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di
i217a2('bum): ltar dper na/ na mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbu seMs myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ na mkha' zhes mying du brjod
